111211.content: You settle on the red-furred male Renamon costume, but also buy a regular female version for your girlfriend, Caitlin. Surprisingly , the two magnificent fursuits cost almost nothing. After a brief drive back to your place, you decide to try on yours. It feels like it was custom sewn to your dimensions. When you put the suit's head on, you feel a strange warmth on your skin all over your body. This becomes a constant pricking, before ceasing altogether. You stroke the fur on your suit's arm, but as you do, you actually feel it. You attempt to remove the suit, but all it does is cause you pain. "I think that dude sold me a Fusion Fursuit! This is epic!" You shout in joy. You turn on your laptop and log it in using your new Digi-powers and open Google so you can...
111211.title: I Look Good in Fur!

choices: Go ahead, wear the Fat Renamon costume. What can go wrong?
On second thought, why not wear the regular Renamon costume
111212.content:
Although there were a lot of Renamon costumes with various different fur colors, you preferred the classic yellow and white fur Renamon with purple sleeves. But as you scanned through the aisle, you found the Renamon costume you were looking for. However, you realized that there were two versions of this costume.

One was a regular version of the costume that looked highly attractive. But when you looked at the second version of the Renamon costume, you can clearly see the difference; the second version of the Renamon costume was a fat version of the famed Digimon. You weren't sure why, but you became curious about the fat Renamon costume, as you pulled the bloated Renamon costume from the rack to get a better look at it.

After hoisting the clothesline hook on a display rail, you got a better look at the fat Renamon costume. Judging from the shape of the costume's body design and how loose the costume was, the Fat Renamon costume was designed to allow it's wearer to use either a one-piece fatsuit or separate pieces of padding to make the wearer appear fatter.

But unexpectedly, you heard a voice nearby as it said, "Ah, the Fat Renamon costume. Are you one of those 'Fat Admirers' I have heard so much about?" You quickly turned around to face whoever it was, only to see that the person speaking to you wasn't the elderly man back at the Checkout Aisle, but rather a young woman around your age. She had dark red hair and a pair Emerald green eyes, and an attractive body to boot.

Then, you remembered what the girl said to you, as you replied, "Actually, I was curious. Why does this store even have this kind of costume anyway?" "To tell you the truth, hun; This store actually sells costumes that turn people into a character of their desires if they wear them." She answered, hoping you wouldn't laugh and think that she and the elderly man were crazy. But when you saw the expression on the young girl's face, you realized that she was dead serious, as you said, "Wait, you're serious about these costumes, aren't you?"

The female redhead responded with a single nod, as the expression on her face went from serious to slight melancholy and replied, "That's right. As for why there is a Fat Renamon costume in my family's costume shop, well, let's just say that there are some people in this town that are aroused by women with a some of cellulite on them, whether these fine ladies are human or not."

As you heard what the female redhead said to you, you looked at the Fat Renamon costume and then the regular Renamon costume in comparison. But, for some odd reason, you felt like you were compelled to wear the Fat Renamon costume, as if the plus-sized costume was begging for you to wear it. What are you going to do?
111212.title: Female Renamon

choices: Screw it, you are a wild renamon
1112121.content:
You gave into your curiosity and temptation as you leave the thinned, femimine version on its hook. You thought about it while looking for open changing stations. You see the image of an overweight fox being a fun and lovable dork, playing games, having drinks and jiggling its blubber butt to electro music.

          You find a changing room as the redhead watches from afar. She sees you head inside with a shrug before getting back to work. You were undressing until you only had socks and boxers on as mentioned on the walls of the changing room. You held up the costume and examined it, also putting it in front of yourself in front of the mirror. You chuckle before actually putting the furry fat suit on.

          For its size, it was rather snug. The legs hugged your rather nicely to be honest. You tugged the suit up to cover your bottom half before slipping the sleeved sleeves of the suit over your arms. The zipper was a bit tricky to reach, but after some stretching you grabbed it and zipped it up. You looked to see if it was fully zipped, not seeing a zipper at all. You thought it was correct before slipping the head on. Once that was placed correctly, you feel about a couple hundred pounds of fat weigh you down. You didn't know it was from the suit since you blew off what the redhead said. You smiles as you look yourself over, seeing realistic blubber on your yellow body. You start to leave until the same girl stops you.

          "So, you want to be a fat renamon for the rest of your life?" Her arms were crossed with a teasing smile. "This is just a costume. A realistic one, but still a costume." You huff and grab your pants, fishing for your wallet to pay for the costume. She raises an eyebrow. "Explain your higher voice, moving mouth, swaying tail and the blush."

          Your eyes widen as you look behind you and to your muzzle. You didn't even notice your voice change, like it was that voice to begin with. "Uh... Just take the money." "You keep it. You need it to by new clothes anyway." She patted your belly before walking off. You were seemingly anitomically correct, but some fur and fat covered most parts. Clothes wouldn't hurt and yours won't fit the grown rear of yours.
1112121.title: Fat renamon it is.

choices: Head to a bathroom, vomiting in public sounds absurd. Uh, 'more absurd', even.
You could just ignore it; or eat something, that idea sounds better, actually...
11121211.content:
Huh, seems that whole exchange is over and done with. Still, you're beginning to wonder if this decision really screams 'you'.

More accurately, you're stuck wondering whether or not the past you even has enough money to afford new clothes, let alone a whole wardrobe. You sigh, the tone throwing you off as much as the residual jiggling your yellow figure does whilst you gather your thoughts. As could be imagined, you're finding your portly figure to be a bit more of a hindrance than a help. Plus, your now three digit hands aren't too pleasing to rub together, even with almost pillowy consistency to each finger that slides together. You let your similar three toed feet slowly clack onto the ground as you waddle along, eventually pausing to fetch your wallet. Uh, your wallet that's within your pants...

Crud, seems all you're pawing at is supple underbelly, as mildly appealing as that sounds. Your breaths turn into huffs, as you struggle to formulate a plan to get your money back, or at least into a setting where having clothes isn't a terrible idea. That is, until you realize you've got fur, right. The stuff seems to coat your figure decently enough, an especially big tuft on your chest, and being rather pleasant to the touch. Of course, that doesn't remedy your other issues, namely the fact that your wallet, and come to think of it phone has up and disappea-

*brrmpt, brrrmpt*

Seems your stomach is vibrating... Though, didn't you have your pants off, anyways? You glance a little behind you, to find almost no trace of your previous attire, let alone anything else. Come to think of it, the lady you were talking with just kinda faded, too. Still, something's messing up your stomach, and all the junk inside; you might wanna try to hack it up, or something...
11121211.title: Clothes for alarm...

choices: Head into a restaurant; they've got bathroom, and food!
Uh- Someones walking by, act natural...
111212111.content:
The vibrations really aren't doing your pudgy figure any favors, even if it's akin to that weird shock therapy stuff.

Ironically, the stuff to contort muscles, and loose weight. Technically that might work, but you don't have all day to loiter around and wait. You do have weight however, which is a problem when you're slowly waddling to a restroom. Well, you're doing so on the street, but that won't stop you from finding it weird, really. Thankfully the vibrating has ceased in it fatty flubbing for the moment, and you're just left with each weighted step you take wobbling yourself around for now. It's arguably worse to deal with, though you can't be bothered to take more tentative steps for now. For a little while you just survey the city, and how much slower it was moving along with your new lethargic gait.

You were intending to meet with your friend by now, but you're a bit late for that, eugh. You just take solace in the fact that you can explain why you're late easily, assuming people aren't freaked out by your appearance. Besides, you're already wanting to take a breather, no bathrooms in sight. Of course, you could just head into a building to do your gagging, though even then you might have people questioning why you're so, fluffy... Still, your 'fluffy' stomach is rumbling some, feeling as though it's got a hearty lump of odd stuff within, whilst you feel an ebb of hunger among-st your absurdly chunky frame.

You elect to just lean against a lamppost for the moment, each breath making you wobble a little less as you decide what would be your best option for the moment.
111212111.title: Phoning it in. -er, 'out'

choices: It's still your old wallet? Odd. Wait- Did you eat yourself?
It's more 'your wallet', your ID card sporting your new blubbery mug
1112121111.content:
As luck would have it, you seem to be outside of a coffee shop! Which is great, because similarly to the image of a dorky dough-ball you were thinking up earlier, you're gonna want to get some caffeine in your system. Once you're not puffing more than a steam engine, you begin to saunter yourself inside, the glass doors of the mostly greenish coffee shop leaving barely any of your size, or wideness to the imagination; you seem to need to pry both open to even waddle inside...

Luckily nobody screams bloody horror whenever you finally get inside, though your awkward walk into first the mens, then after a brief realization 'womens' bathrooms, garners a stare or two from the patrons inside. There's occasional whispering as well, the occasional 'it's her' making you believe you might be more popular than you used to be...

But enough of that; you're in the bathroom, and you've got some stuffs to vomit, especially considering how your stomach is annoyingly rumbling, again... You just give some of your gut's rolls a hearty wobble, hoping that'd be enough to coax some nausea. It really isn't; actually, you feel a little better after the fact, eugh. After a moment, you simply press one of your meaty fingers into your mouth, and after a while, begin to jettison whatever was in your stomach...

It's your phone! And wallet, and uh, hm. That's weird, but at least you're not vibrating anymore, the phone in question having a number calling it, your friend's number to be exact. You elect not to answer for now, especially since your weird hands probably can't tap the screen properly anyway. Still, you do scoop both items up from the sink you were leaning over, your middle having been dug into the sink whilst you did so. Checking the internals of the wallet reveals, hm.
1112121111.title: Well, *'bathrooms', but still, onward we trot

choices: Impulsively you say 'the usual', despite not remembering being here before, ever
You get something simple; doughnut holes and a large, sugary coffee
11121211112.content:
As much as you're perplexed as to why your wallet is in your stomach, as would be your phone, you're at least in proper possession of both items in this case. Your now emptied stomach just rumbles a little, the fuzz on it's surface for now hiding all the fleshy wobbles that were occurring alongside said vocalized hunger. You debate between messing about with your phone, and the wallet's other contents, but are cut off by someone entering the bathroom with a slight 'oh', likely upon noticing your rounded behind, and everything else... You just cup your items in one hand, eventually leaving the bathroom to avoid much else in the way of awkward encounters.

As much as you find the ladies room much less carpeted and cushy than you expected, such disappointments would have to wait for now. Your current objective should probably be getting something to eat, as much as you'd rather explore your figure some, given how enticing it's soft and otherwise excessively cozy bits seem to be. You idly lick at your lips some, your face seemingly flanked by chubby cheeks, the usual sleekness one would associate with an actual 'Renamon' lost within the couple hundred pounds you're lugging about.

Regardless, you paw through the purple wrist bits that came with your costume, one of them having a convenient slot for your phone and wallet to push themselves into, for the moment. It was a bit odd, though both seemed to have that sort of pocket built in, further digging revealing a folded up menu in the other one, along with some strange gift cards. None of them are labeled, so for now you elect to just leave them be, by now having your sizable self in line, to get something to push into your greedy gut.

Whenever you're able to take one thigh-rubbing step to be next to the counter, your maw muses an order... Though, what specifically?
11121211112.title: Perpetually Pudgy

choices: ...You, uh, can't stop. Like, you can't stop yourself from eating...
Wait- Your friend is in the crowd! The one that was calling your 'gut phone'...
111212111121.content:
Despite not having memories within your newly fuzzed head of routine coffee trips, you seem to just muse out 'the usual', albeit in quite the feminine, and given your rounded cheeks, muffled voice. The barista on duty just sighs a little, and you seem to similarly weave your way though oddly specific foodstuff questions, without having to think much at all about the answers... At least by the end of the process your subconscious knows to use the 'orange' card of your lot, even though all your idle behaviors feel a little obnoxious, even though you were the cause of most of the idle huffing, or due to attempting to use your muzzle's nose to breathe, 'snorting'.

You just opt to plop your jiggling behind into a booth, more instinct telling you this is your 'usual' spot, whilst some of the coffee shop staff lug out the tray's worth of sweets you apparently ordered... After getting a couple small stacks of doughnuts, several containers purely of stuff that's supposed to go onto the coffees this place deals in, like 'a large caramel container', uh, just of caramel, you decide it might be best just to dig in for now... A couple bites in, and you already are starting to feel the drab effects of being so bulky, with your furry and otherwise pillowy arms burning with tension before long, given all of the heavy lifting you had to do to get to your maw...

Of course, you're at least left feeling better after a doughnut or two, though even with those, you seem to have an urge to keep going... How strong said urge is seems yet to be decided though, regardless of the slight crowd that's been gathered around you, and your apparently casual gluttony. In the midst of glancing at all the faces focused on you, you seem to realize something, hm.
111212111121.title: Muscle reflex? Maybe 'lard' reflex, really...

choices: Eat even more like the rabid digimon you’ve become.
1112121111211.content:
Somewhat proudly you continue to gobble up doughnuts, as the people in cafe watch though by now you’ve grown accustomed to it, even being somewhat proud by being the center of attention.

by the time your belly even feels slightly full you felt an uncontrollable urge to continue on eating with your big furry paws happily grabbing doughnuts to your maw without you even thinking about it.

Maybe this isn’t that bad after all?... all this yummy food going directly to your white fuzzy gut is starting to make you feel all warm and squishy. And it’s wonderful~

Soon enough after what had felt like hours you finally lay back a bit in your seat as you let out a hearty sigh of relief, as you think that you’ve filled your belly to the brim.

You quietly enjoy rubbing your belly with your paws as you quietly consider where all this fat will go~
Maybe it’ll stay in your belly?
Or maybe it’ll go and become flab on your already phat ass.
You quietly sigh and let out hiccups as you rub your overly stuffed belly, but before long you feel as though you can eat again.
Though to be honest it wasn’t what you really wanted to do, but when your belly started to growl and churn as it begged you to keep on eating it was hard to say no.
Especially as there was this tiny, tiny, feeling that you should’ve kept eating anyways.

And eat you certainly do, as you stuff multiple doughnuts into your fat maw as you try and stuff your belly to the limit!
With you only stopping to take a quick breath before feeding yourself more and more in the public eye.
Something about having people watch you eat clearly makes you more hungry than you should be~

Though after a tad bit later you can barely even move with how full your stomach is.
You quietly hum as you put your paws over your belly once more... and surprisingly a belch escapes your maw, causing your cheeks to turn red as you quietly think how natural and good that felt, especially to let out unneeded gas in your already full stomach.

Soon enough though you hear your phone ring...
You could answer it... or you could continue to eat.

111232121.content:
You take the costume of the Agumon up to the old man at the front. "Find everything that you need? I really hope you like that costume." He says rather sincerely. "Tell you what. Since everyone likes that costume so much. I'll give it to you free."

"Free?!" You ask excitedly, looking at the rather real looking anthro Agumon.

"Yup." He says, and tacks on a rather friendly "scram kid."

You hurry out of the costume shop toward your car and scramble home. Traveling at the speed limit in an effort to go home and try on the costume. You slam on the brakes and quickly put the car in park. You get out and rush inside and to your room. You finally get to have some peace and quiet to try on this costume.

You remove all of your clothes and fold them neatly on the bed in front of you. Next you take the Lugia costume out of the box and look at it again.

The costume was in the traditional Agumon colors, orange/yellow. It had a short stubby tail, and a rather hungry looking face. You smile and unzip the back and quietly set you foot in.

The toes were digitigrade and looked rather odd on your feet. Next thing was to get the arms through. You bend over and pick them up and you slip your arm through. You pull the costume's head over you and you make sure it snugly fit's through. You zip it up and walk over to the mirror and glance at an very loose costume. You smile then stop as a feeling suddenly sweeps through your body.

Your kin feels like it's dissolving.This feeling permeates through out your body. You feel it swell up and become fuller wit the costume. The feeling of your feet filling up the costume's and your muscle and bone growing to suit it. The same thing happens all over your body. Your chest grows smaller as it swells to fit the costume. Your neck does the same thing, choking you for air. You feel like your asphyxiating, you scramble around and try to desperately get air, only to black out near the door. As you black out, you shrink.

You wake up much later. You moan in discomfort, only to have it turn into a slight yelp near the end as you notice an Agumon claw. "What the?" you mutter, looking down at your self. You walk over to the mirror and gasp.

The first change is your face, now a rounded looking protrusion. You open your mouth to a cuved tounge and a row of rather pointed and spred out human teeth (you assume that your still an omnivore). The next thing you notice is your actual body, still rather human in nature but your chest is smaller and the same color as the costume, starkly contrast to your yellow/orange skin. You continue down further, glancing at your (conveniently) covered groin area.You take a quick peek down. Unsurprisingly, your genitals have become more suited to your body. In the rear, you notice that your underwear has a hole in it, which you assume is for your tail.

You test your tails dexterity and strength by moving a variety of positions and moving objects around the room. You also note that our new feet give you a variety of freedoms. You smile as your body becomes more familiar to you, a sudden thought crashes your fun.

'Now what?' you think. 'How should I live my life?'

11211.content: You walk up to the Ash costume, and it is pretty cool. They have his jacket, shirt, pants, shoes, and a tight latex mask with real hair and a red hat. 1121312.content:
If the Misty costume were a real girl rather than what seems to be the skin and clothes of a real live girl -- it's not pallid like a corpse's skin, but with the healthy pink flush of a live human's -- you'd think that the girl was the original and the cartoon Misty a brilliant caricature of her. Even empty and fleshless, with no eyes visible through its half-closed eyelids, "Misty" looks utterly sweet and adorable, and seems to have enough of a chest to be well into her teens, no longer an unripe little girl but someone you'd have no qualms about having sex with. It's hard to tell exactly with her boneless face, but she looks about sixteen years old, or maybe an unusually girlish nineteen or twenty at the very most. She appeals to you as a hot young woman would, not as a little girl. Sexual desire for her seems entirely suitable.

You find yourself wondering whether you could get a date for that costume party and have her wear this costume while you get an Ash costume. Then you admit to yourself that you'd rather wear this Misty costume. You don't have any transvestite tendencies... or maybe you do, deep down, that you won't admit to yourself?

What settles it is a little label hanging from the oddly-shaped hanger (a normal clothes hanger would leave thr empty Misty head dangling behind the costume's back, but this one keeps it facing upright): "One size fits all -- GUARANTEED!" In smaller print it continues: "Wearing this costume will make you look and sound exactly like MISTY (tm) brought to life, or double your money back -- no exceptions!" The "(tm)" is the trademark symbol, and the "MISTY" is printed on a little label in a slightly different typeface.

Seeing this seems almost to compel you to put on the costume, if only to prove that it can't possibly work as claimed. Greed doesn't hurt: double your money back? Surely a costume this detailed -- it's like the skin of a young woman to the tiniest detail! -- must be expensive, You could max out your credit card on it, then get twice the money back...

With the Misty costume over your left arm, you go to

1152111.content:
You find yourself fascinated with one Yi-Gi-Oh costume in particular, that of Téa Gardner, or to give the character her original Japanese name, Anzu Mazaki, and you don't know why. She's cute, but sort of a lame character. You could see yourself getting your girlfriend to wear an Anzu costume -- if you had a girlfriend -- but you don't particularly want to be in drag as her.

The costume isn't just a set of cosplayer-style clothes imitating the usual school clothes that Anzu wears. It seems to be a head-to-toe human skin with nothing inside, on a padded clothes hanger, the clothes hung over it. The girl's hollow, empty head, its long hair trailing, is attached to the costume's neck and hangs behind the rest of the costume. Clearly this Anzu costume is meant to cover its wearer head to toe! You take a close look at the "skin," particularly its face. It looks like the skin of a live girl, with the glow of life and health a real live girl's skin would have. This suit is not meant to make its wearer look like a character from an animated cartoon, but like a real girl who, if she can act, would be perfectly cast as Anzu in a live-action Yu-Gi-Oh series or movie. Its material feels a lot like skin, only room-temperature and remarkably elastic. It would certainly stretch to fit you, but with your body inside it, how could it possibly look right? You're entirely the wrong build.

Convenient little dressing rooms are scattered through the shop. There's one only a few paces away. You feel an odd pull, not quite a compulsion though almost, to take the Anzu suit and its clothes to the nearest one and put them on. Then again, you'd like to know more about this costume, and you really should ask permission before trying it on...
1152111.title: Yes

choices: Take the costume to a dressing room.
11521112.content:
The shop seems much bigger inside than it did from the outside, but you soon find the shopkeeper. "Ah, yes, the Anzu Mazaki costume, or, if you prefer, Téa Gardner. An excellent choice for you!"

"I've never wanted to dress up like a girl," you say, "but for some reason I want to wear this costume. I'm just afraid I'll look ridiculous in it, though."

"No need to be afraid of that," he says. "It's one size fits all. It covers your entire body, and once it's sealed up, it changes itself into the skin of a real-life Anzu, and your body into the body inside that skin. Complete metamorphosis. You could get your chromosomes checked while you had it on, and the test would come back purely female, not a Y chromosome in you."

"That's impossible," you say.

"Why not try on the costume?" he asks. "Wouldn't you love to show up at your friend's party as a real-life Anzu? You'd cause a sensation and have a blast."

Some instinct tells you to put down this rather uncanny girl-costume and run out of the shop. Yet mostly you find that you want to get inside the hollow rubbery thing shaped like a girl's skin, just to see what happens -- or doesn't.
11521112.title: Take the Anzu costume to the shopkeeper.

choices: You freak out, hurriedly get dressed, and leave.
You slip your right leg into the costume's.
115211122.content:
You're still not sure why you're doing this. Maybe you have a transvestite streak you don't want to admit even to yourself. Maybe it was the old shopkeeper's calm assurance that putting on this costume will make you into someone who's a real girl according to a chromosome count, and your disbelief -- or do you really disbelieve him?

The dressing room is bigger than you expected. There are plenty of hooks and hangars for your clothes. You strip down methodically, hanging up your clothes and putting your shoes in a convenient cubbyhole. Then you start removing from their hanger the clothes that come with the Téa/Anzu costume, hanging them up separately. The shoes, stockings, and underclothes are in a bag attached to the hanger. Finally you get to see the whole "skin" without anything in the way.

It looks as much as ever like the skin of a live girl who would be perfectly cast in a live-action Yu-Gi-Oh show or movie. There just isn't any girl-body inside it, and it has something rather like a zipper only less toothy running from crotch to chin. It seems to be lined entirely with a dull gray material, pleasant to the touch but rather slippery.
115211122.title: Take the costume to a dressing room.

choices: Panic and try to change back.
1152111222.content:
Your right leg slides smoothly into that of the Anzu skin, and your toes pop neatly into its hollow ones. The left leg is almost as easy to put on, and your male genitals pop neatly into a little pouch at the suit's crotch. It's almost as if the thing needs a human body inside it and it trying to make itself as easy to put on as possible. Soon your fingertips are inside the suit's, and before you know it, you've fitted your head neatly inside its head, and are starting to zip it up as if you put on such a suit every day.

Once the zipper is shut, it seems to melt into the costume skin. Then the changes hit as you watch your image in the mirror. Putting your bigger, thicker male body inside this smaller, slenderer girl-skin distorted it, but now it swiftly undoes the distortion, taking its proper shape again and making your body shrink perfectly to fit it. The process is almost painless. In maybe three minutes, a beautiful slender girl looks back at you from the mirror. The Anzu of the cartoon show is the most brilliant possible caricature of the girl in the mirror: if she were based on a real, live girl, that girl would be exactly like you. You feel naked: the skin of the girl suit is now your own true skin.
1152111222.title: You slip your right leg into the costume's.

choices: "That would be telling, my girl," he says.
11521112222.content:
You suppose that you should be freaked out, because as far as you can tell, you've just been transformed into a real-life Anzu Mazaki (Téa Gardner) of Yu-Gi-Oh! fame. You look as if you're the original girl and the anime character is a brilliant caricature that could have been based only on you. Yet this feels so good, so right, as if you are precisely who you should be.

You get dressed in the clothes that came with your, well, new skin. Soon you're Anzu, dressed perfectly for school -- or who she would be if she were a real girl and not a mere character. With a confident smile wonderfully caricatured as that of the anime version of you, you step out of the dressing room.

"Ah, Anzu, yourself at last," the old shopkeeper says to you.

"I'm not Anzu -- though I must admit, I look the way she would if she were a real girl," you say. Only then does it dawn on you that both you and the shopkeeper spoke perfect idiomatic Japanese.

"Maybe you'd rather be called Téa," he says, this time in English. "You should be able to switch voice and language between Anzu and Téa at will."

"But I can't just become her!" you almost wail. "How do I get out of this costume?"
11521112222.title: Put on your girl clothes.

115211122221.content:
"What do you mean, what costume?" you ask the old man, still in English, and even from inside your own head, your voice sounds to you just like the American voice artist doing her Téa Gardner voice.

"The transformation is permanent, Téa," he says in matter-of-fact tones. "There is no longer a boy in a Téa suit. There's only the real-life Téa, or Anzu if you prefer, created from that boy and that suit. It's irreversible."

"I'm STUCK this way?" you ask, feeling yourself on the verge of panic.

"There needed to be a real-life Anzu," he says. "Now there is one. Oh, and the world can do without the boy who provided the raw material for you, my dear."

You have the girl's agility and muscles and dance moves, and you start kicking the old man with your sturdy little schoolgirl shoes.
115211122221.title: "What costume?" he asks.

choices: "Yes, but wait!  I can still help you."
"I'll show you how to take off your suit."
1152111222212.content:
The old shopkeeper yelps with pain as you kick him repeatedly, warding off your kicks ineffectively. Soon you kick his knees out from under him, and he's on the floor. Nobody comes to his aid. A perfectly-delivered kick to the groin really takes the fight out of him, and through his pain he says, "Please, please, stop! I'll do anything I can, just stop!"

You stop, but you're ready to kick his teeth out by this point. "Anything?" Damn, it's a pure Téa Gardner voice.

"As far as I'm able, my word as a wizard, honestly!" he says.

"Great," you say in perfectly Téa Gardner tones, "a crazy old man who thinks he's a wizard..."

"Explain your current body in some way other than magic," he says.

"Okay, so maybe you're a wizard," you say, and let him get up. "Now, am I really stuck this way?"

He says,
1152111222212.title: He starts begging for mercy.

11521112222121.content:
"How can you help me if I'm stuck as Téa Gardner?" you ask, letting the anger arise in your Téa voice.

"I could make a costume that disguises your new body as a copy of your old one," he says. "Every person coming into this shop gets scanned, and based on the scan of your old body, I can make a suit that can fool anyone into thinking that you're the old you! You'd still be Téa Gardner, but you could look and feel like the old you, and convince anyone that you still are."

"Why the hell can't you just get me out of this girl suit and changed back into who I should be?"

"As I told you, the body suit that made you as you are now causes an irreversible change---" he begins.

"Why are you selling things like that, anyway?" you ask. "Most people who buy a costume want to look like someone else for a while, not to become someone else! What kind of costume shop is this?"

"It's a trap," he says, sounding miserable. "My, uh, employer is holding my family hostage... he has a strange liking for... well, mostly for female characters in anime, but other types as well. He wants real-life versions of them, but that means taking real people and changing them into the characters he wants. And he insisted on Téa Gardner, and... well, you had the bad luck..."
11521112222121.title: "Yes, but wait!  I can still help you."

115211122221212.content:
"I had the bad luck to be latched on to by this damn' Anzu suit," you conclude.

"Yes, exactly," he says. "Look what happened to me! I have to wear a me suit!" He fiddles with something at his neck, and what had been his skin becomes a costume loose over a shorter body, a slit opening from the chin down. The resulting person stretches the false head, and through the neck of the costume pops the head of a real-life version of:
115211122221212.title: You let him explain further.

choices: You go off to try other costumes.
1152111222212122.content:
Under the older-man suit she reluctantly lets slide to the floor, she's a stark-naked Mai Kujaku, or Mai Valentine! You can't help but emit a purely Téa Gardner laugh, which you moderate to that of your Japanese version Anzu. Then in your perfect colloquial Japanese you make fun of her big breasts and blonde hair and Western appearance, and she snaps back a crude little insult in the same language, something quite unsuitable for broadcast. "At least the magic doesn't censor what we say," she says in a Mai Valentine voice and in English, and seals up the man costume and turns into the old man again. "And you should talk," he goes on. "You have a pretty serious rack for a little schoolgirl, and your hair's brown!"

"So you're really Mai now!" you say in English and your Téa voice, stating the obvious.

"And my wife's purely heterosexual and doesn't want a beautiful young woman for a husband!" he says. "Yes. Got it in one! But the me-suit makes me feel as if I'm me again, when I'm wearing it, and if you behave I can get you a suit of your former self, as I said. Yes, the guy-parts work, okay?"

"That's the best you can do?" you ask.

"Or you can try wearing another suit," he says. "Sometimes they end up stuck on you. Probably they'll come off and you'll be Téa Gardner again. I'll get to work on your you-suit. You can help or you can try to be someone else."

"I can help?" you ask.

"Mostly you'll be in the way, but, yeah, sort of," he says. "Doesn't much matter either way."

1153221.content:
You pull off the heavy Jiraiya cosplay outfit off the rack and look it over.
There's a mesh pants and top, green gi, a red vest jacket, a headband with a larger-than-normal metal plate, and rather large wooden geta sandals. You know Jiraiya is about the perviest character in the Naruto universe, and you know you're about th perviest person you know, so you might as well see how you look as him.

You shrug off your clothes and start on the outfit. You have a little difficulty putting them on as they're quite large. You finally slide on the red vest jacket, and tie the headband up on your forehead. You step into the geta sandals, and try to balance as well as you can on the precarious things.

Stumbling over to the mirror, you try to admire yourself. You do look kinda like Jiraiya. If he were younger, short, skinny, and had shorter hair. Very unimpressing.
That's when the change starts.
You almost stumble off the sandals as your feet swell to fit. Suddenly they're fitting quite well and not likely to drop you.

You look down in shock as your shins and thighs are stretching before your eyes. You feel warm muscle squirm up your calves, thighs, and pelvis, before moving to your stomach.

You gasp as your chest and shoulders widen, taking the costume from its previous bagginess and pulling to a much more comfortable fit. Warmth fills your back and front as your chest, stomach and back slowly firm, and harden with a man's physique.

Warmth spreads down your biceps and forearms as they swell with muscle and age. Your hands shift and thicken as you watch intrigued. This should scare the living hell out of you, but you feel at ease, and oddly enough, amused.

You watch in interest as your hair turns white and starts growing over the top of the headband. It falls in two curtains to frame both sides of your face. You can feel it still growing as white hair cascades down your back before it stops.

Like bloody tears, a red line appears at the far lower corners of each of your eyes and crawl down your face until they disappear under your jaw. Slowly but surely, your jaw and cheekbones shift and broaden as your skin ages to match. Your young tight skin changes complexion to a clear, weathered tan with healthy laugh lines and a little pouchiness to it. Your eyes darken to an almost black brown. The same eyes change shape and narrow with discernment.

You stand there rather shocked, but though the transformation has finished, you don't move.
This isn't a dream is it? You think.
You lift one large arm and look at the big, calloused hand. You touch your face gingerly and feel the new texture. As you rub your square jaw, you grab a section of your cheek and pinch.

You yelp in a deep voice thats not your own, and rub the sore spot delicately. You run your hands through the shaggy white mop of hair, across your broad chest, your hard stomach, and other places. Huh.... So I'm Jiraiya, now? You wonder...
Well, everyone did say I'm the perviest person they know. Now it fits! What should I do now?

11532221.content:
You take down the recognizable chuunin outfit from the rack. It consists of the usual outfit: dark blue longsleeve shirt, green chuunin vest, navyblue ninja pants, open-toed/open-heeled slippers, and a metal-plated headband.

It's hard to know which character it belongs to, considering quite a few of the characters wear the same thing. The small clues are two bangles, there's tape below the shoulders of both longsleeves, and a light blue loincloth with a red japanese symbol over a darkblue circle. You shrug, and undress.

It feels odd slipping the clothing on. Its as if it's just a few sizes too big, but not uncomfortable. You can't see your toes out of the slippers, and even though the sleeves of the longsleeve are rolled up, they fall past your wrist. You put the forehead protector on and tie up the loincloth around your waist.

Wait, how'd I know to tie it around my waist? You think, confused. You look in the mirror and size yourself up. The whole thing would look okay if you were about 10-15 years older or so. You're just too young to make it work.

Suddenly, a huge tremor runs through your body. You convulse wildly and almost collapse. You grab onto the mirror and wall for support. You try and get a good grip, but your hand, slippery with sweat keeps sliding up, as though pushed from below.

You realize you're getting taller. Looking down, you can see your feet expanding and lengthening to fit the slippers. The very skin texture and color, harden and tan before your eyes. As new looking toes stick out of the tops, your shins and thighs crack a few more inches before stopping. You suddenly feel your muscles burning and expanding, your legs filling the pants until they're fitting perfectly.

This time you actually collapse. You crash into the wall whimpering as your spine pushes up a few inches. You crawl forward unevenly as your short arms are offbalance with your new longer legs.

Suddenly your chest seems to be inflate. You gasp in pain as you grasp them. The ribcage itself feels as though its being pushed apart. It stops suddenly. Then you feel heat flood your stomach, chest, and back. The heat burns in an almost comforting way, as you feel large curves start to form over your front. You run your hands over your broad-feeling chest, and moan in surprise at how firm and large your pecs feel. You rub lower, and feel a hard cobblestone surface of sixpack abs. You realize slowly that you're changing into whoever this cosplay is of.

The hard burn moves into your shoulders, which become wide and broad, taking up a good portion of the vest and shirt. With a sick crunch, your arms stretch out to an adults length. Muscle begins lacing its way through your shouders, and starts to move down your biceps. Your now-visible lower forearms and hands change to that weathered tan color. Your forearms suddenly vein-up and show a harder definition. Your hands crack and pop as the palms widen, and the fingers grow longer and thicker, your long unkept nails shortening and widening.

You crawl awkwardly in this new body to the mirror, knowing there's only one more place that can change. You're on your knees before it, warm, thick palms placed against its cool surface as you await the inevitable. You choke loudly as your neck stretches and thickens. You watch as your adam's apple swells, and you let out a pained grunt that is much deeper than it should be.

Your skull suddenly crunches loudly. You can hear it both in your ears, and in your head itself. You cluch it as pain momentarily blurs your vision. For a second you marvel at how much bigger your hands feel on your head. The pain fades to a tingling burn and your vision returns. Your hair turns black and pulls itself backwards. The same black hair begins to grow into sideburns along the sides of your face. They thicken and start to itchily grow down to the crook of your jaw. From they're more hair begins to grow down your jawline and on your chin. It thickens into a solid beard, with a goatee point at your chin. Your face starts to reshape between your hands. Your eyes change to brown and narrow slightly. Your skin tans and ages to a weathered age 30 type. Your jawline widens and squares slightly. Your nose widens a bit at the bridge and tip, before broadening out. Just like that, the burning pain stops.

As you start to cool off, you're frozen at the sight of your new self. You tentatively touch your skin. Its warm and rather sweaty, but its skin and the feeling thats coming through indicates its really yours. You poke and prod your soft, yet firm face. You stroke your new beard thoughtfully. You tug it lighly and wince at the pain. The foreign face in the mirror pulls the same look. You stand up unsteadily, trying to get used to the height difference. The whole outfit seems as though it were tailored for you now. Though you should be shocked, you don't really feel scared. Rather, at the back of your confused thoughts, you wonder where you can get a cigarette around here...

115322222221.content:
You pause slightly at the Naruto costumes. They seem to have every character imaginable on the shelf, even the most obscure ones. You loved the series, and secretly had a crush on one character in particular. Stopping suddenly, you spotted a familiar green jacket next to a pale fleshly suit with blond hair in two pig tails. The fifth Hokage, Tsunade.

You sweated nervously, wanting to grab the suit, pay for it, and leave. That's when you noticed there were two costumes. A child one and an adult one.
115322222221.title: Tsunade

1153222222211.content:
As nonchalantly as possible, you grabbed the clothing and the skin suit off the shelf. Looking around to make sure no one was watching you, you stuffed the costume under your hoodie. It would be downright embarrassing if someone caught you with this thing.

You quietly crept up to the register. Pulling the costume out, you tried to make sure that no one was watching you from behind by blocking it from sight with your back. If the store owner decided to question why you were buying this, you'd have to make up something. You'd probably say it was for your girlfriend or something.

The owner didn't even bat an eye over the suit though and just smiled, scanned it, and tossed it in a non-see through bag. "That'll be $25, sir!"

That was much cheaper than you were expecting the costume to be.You paid for it and grabbed the bag. Now all that was left was to answer the question where you were going to try the thing on...
1153222222211.title: Grown up version.

choices: Put on your old clothes and walk home.
11532222222112.content:
"I wonder if the guys will recognize me in this..." You thought to yourself as you headed to the changing rooms. You reasoned that it would probably be best to change into the costume here and walk home with it on, that way no one would see you carrying it around.

Locking the door, you quickly stripped down to your underwear. The suit came with a set of instruction in the bag it was in telling you to remove all clothing and step in through the mouth of the suit.

"Okay, weird..." You said, expecting there would be a zipper at least.

You just shrug and follow the instructions, stepping in one foot at time into the deflated Tsunade skin. You're rather tall and lanky compared to Tsunade's height of 5'3, but the suit stretches really well and you can fit both legs inside after a little wiggling.

It fits like a glove, you pull the costume all the way up to your neck. Fitting your hands into the arms proves to be somewhat difficult as the suit keeps sticking to your skin but eventually you have the entire thing on from the neck down. It's tight but at the same time cozy and soft.

Grabbing the flaps of the now over-stretched mouth of the mask, you pull the suit's face over your own. It takes a few seconds to align it in the mirror, but once you finish you look like a near splitting of Tsuande from the anime. Except of course for the body shape.

"Wow, not bad." You say, admiring how the mask actually moves when you talk. "I can't even tell it's a costume!"

You check out the clothing in the bag. It has all of the Tsunade apparel, but there's a slight problem. It seems to be made for someone her own size, which is of course far too small for your over 6 foot frame.

"Crap...What should I do?"
11532222222112.title: Putting on the suit here.

115322222222.title: Shizune

11532222222222211.content: You were always known to be an overconfident person, so to be attracted to the shyest character in the Naruto series was a little contradictory. But you couldn't help it: you always had a secret crush for her, but you never told anyone; you would've been as wierd. You took the costume off and went to a nearby changing cabin. The costume consisted of her usual gray baggy sweater with the fur on the hood and sleeves, navy blue pants, the usual sandals and her forehead protector. You began taking off your clothes and you put on the costume. Even if it was very baggy for her, it was a bit tight for you, especially considering the fact you're much taller than her and much more muscular. But past that, you were finally able to get in. Finally, as a last touch, you put the headband around your neck, 'just like Hinata wears it', you think dreamily. However, your dreams are cut short by a sharp pain all over your body. Taken aback, you fell down, panting heavily. Suddenly, your legs started to burn intensely and when you looked at them, you realized that they're beginning to shrink and get chubby. From there, the visible muscle mass in your legs was now gone. After, the pain intensified to the upper part of your body. You're trying to get up, but it's difficult with your new legs not used to all that weight up there. But then, it began to lighten up, as you started to shrink to your crush's height, while your crotch begins to recede and disappear and your arms lose a lot of their muscle as well. You were now fitting perfectly in the attire, but that was the least of your worries. You felt like you're going to throw up any minute while 2 small bumps on your chest began to inflate and form a pair of small breasts. You felt your neck shortening drastically and your Adam's apple disappear. As you began to scream in pain, you realized your voice was getting squeakier and squeakier until it reached young Hinata's tone of voice. As you looked in the mirror, you understood there's only one thing left to change: your head. That's when a searing pain, worse then before, went through your skull, reshaping itself and getting rounder with a slightly pointed chin. Your nose began to get smaller and rounder too while your eyes doubled in height, your nutty brown becoming white with a slight tinge of lavender. Finally, your long brown scruffy hair began to recede and change to a blue-purple colour while arranging itself into her classic haircut. Finally, the pain stopped just as suddenly as it came. You took a long look at yourself, examining every inch of your new body, save for the new woman part (you are a gentleman, after all). Suddenly, without thinking, you started to poke your fingers. Then, without warning, memories flood through your brain. Memories that weren't yours... or maybe they were, after all. Your confident self began to get pushed away, replaced by an overly shy personnality. You are Hinata Hyuga, and you were wondering what you were doing in a cabin. Gently, you push the door and find yourself in...

1153321111122.title: No... But it's about to...

11533211111221.content:
You wake up on the floor of the changing room stall, with your regular clothes draped over you. "My head..." you mutter, getting up. Once on your feet, you notice your clothes are sticking to the Kagome costume. You try to pull them off, but to no avail, like they were merging with the material. "What is..." As you spoke, you saw the mouth of the costume move in sync with your mouth... no, you felt... it WAS your mouth. In panic, you reach for the zipper, but can't find it.

Then you begin to feel a sticky sensation as the costume constricts on you. On your chest perky C-cup breasts fill the sailor fuku as you feel your loins tighten up. It was becoming clear the costume was merging with you, turning you into Kagome... or was it? You saw Kagome's hair was no longer black, but a bright red, closer to your own hair color. Even though you now had giant anime eyes, they were green, not brown like Kagome's. You saw yourself lose height, but you were familiar with Kagome's height, and found you stopped shrinking halfway between your original height and Kagome's height. You watched your clothes merge with Kagome's school uniform, changing her fuku into a black spaghetti-strap tank top, her green pleated skirt into a denim miniskirt, and her socks and loafers into knee-high black steel-toe boots. In the corner of the room, your wallet becomes a purse, while, the biggest shock, the Swiss Army Knife you had in your pants merged with a piece of the costume you didn't notice before; a prop bow and arrows. The two merged and became an Uzi sub-machine gun.

You stare in disbelief, feeling yourself over, finding no seems, no zipper, and every touch elicits a reaction only touching your own skin could produce. Then looking once more in the mirror, you say, "Real Kagome my foot..." You cover your mouth, hearing your voice, for when you spoke, you sounded just like Kagome!! You remember what the tag said. "'This costume will make you sound like the real kagome or your money back in full.' Well, nuts. They got me on a technicality... but wait!!! How did this thing merge with me in the first place, and why did it keep changing after turning me into Kagome? If I didn't know better, it's like I've become some kind of fusion of Kagome and myself." You pick up your, er, purse, and look inside, checking your license. The picture on it was the face now staring back to you in the mirror, and it said your were female, but your name was still the same. "This is getting weird."

Over the store's PA, a creepy voice akin to Markula (from Aqua Teen Hunger Force) says, "We're closing in 5 minutes. Pleases come up front and make any purchases and get the &^$% out."

Feeling no choice but to head up front, you go to the checkout line, only to find a catgirl Sango dressed in a white blouse, yellow sweater vest, and grey pleated skirt outfit resembling a Japanese high school uniform carrying a perfect scale replica of Hiraikotsu, a female Inuyasha wielding a very realistic Tessaiga (or Tetsusaiga, however you like to spell it), a dead ringer for Miroku, and a blonde girl in a red t-shirt and short shorts that had Kirara's ears and tails. The man the counter, himself a wispy old man with pale skin and long white hair, a long, well manicured fu man shu beard on his face, told the other "customers," "What the hell you talking about? You haven't bought anything, nor are you wearing any costumes, so stop bugging me, and either buy something in the next 30 seconds or get the &^$% out!!" A bell rang, and the man re-issued his demand for them to leave. Catgirl Sango yelled, "But..." Next thing everyone knew, they were on the curb, and all the lights in the store were out. "How'd we get out here?" she said. Suddenly, they turned and saw you.
11533211111221.title: The Merging Kagome Suit...

choices: The Shikon-no-Tama falls from the sky and shatters upside your head.
115332111112212.content: What kind of strange thing?
115332111112212.title: Something strange...r happens...

choices: Hunt for the costume shop owner...
1153321111122122.content:
Before any proper introductions could begin, a glowing spectacle raced across the sky, flying towards... you!! Without time to react, the light clocks you over the head, stopping in mid-air for the man that looked like Miroku to say, "Isn't that the... Shikon-no-Tama?!" Just as he said that, it shattered into hundreds of tiny shards and scattered to the wind, leaving only one shard there. The concussive blow dazed you to the point that you fell out unconscious...

Waking up after dark, you find the same cadre of pseudo-Inuyasha characters around you, but now they were joined by three more people. These people apparently had been customers of the costume shop as well, but weren't wearing Inuyasha-themed costumes.

Next to the catgirl Sango was what looked like Soi Fon... well, more like a bimbo Soi Fon, her hair a light blonde, skin moderately tanned, lips massively pouty and painted a dark and slutty violet, breasts huge (about an I-cup) & gravity-defying, with a tribal tramp stamp tattoo just above her butt, dressed not in Soi Fon's captain's uniform but in 6" platform heels, black micro miniskirt, black thong (with straps exposed above the top of the skirt), and star shaped pasties that barely cover her areolas. However, she was still wearing the sealed Suzumebachi, except it was now on the belt loops of the micro mini.

With the female Inuyasha is a girl that looks just like Lucy Heartfilia from Fairy Tail, dressed in her top and pleated miniskirt, but also happened to be a centaur, the fur on her horse half matching her blonde hair.

Finally, next to the bimbo Soi Fon was a female version of Goku from Dragon Ball Z, but with tail intact.

"Alright... What's going on?" you groggily ask.

"After the Shikon-no-Tama shattered over your head, these three people showed up, having bought costumes from the same shop as we did, and looking to get this fixed, only to find the shop closed." the catgirl Sango told her.

"I figure we should get to know each other, since we're in the same boat now..."

"I'm Greg Kimbles. I'm a defensive back at Southern High. I came here with my girlfriend Alice..." He holds up the centaur Lucy Heartfilia's hand, "...and bought one of this store's costumes for the Halloween ball today. When I put it on, this happened. At first, it looked like I was going to become a carbon copy of Inuyasha, but I tripped and fell into the dirty clothes hamper, and the only thing in it was my sister's underwear at the time, so for some reason it turned me into a girl."

"Rachel McAllister is my name," the centaur Lucy states, "and like my boyfriend, I bought a costume here, and I put it on today, but it so happens I live on a horse farm, and judging from what everyone else has told me, I must have had some latent horse hairs on me when I donned my costume."

The catgirl Sango says, "I'm Hitomi Arisawa. I got this costume as a gift from my mom, who knew I liked Sango. However, my cat jumped in my lap, and she fused into me, turning me into a catgirl when the costume merged to me..."

The bimbo Soi Fon spoke up, stuttering and blushing, "I... I'm... I'm Akiko Arisawa, Hitomi's sister. My friend got me a Soi Fon costume from here, claiming they'd come to the Halloween ball as Yoruichi. However, as I got dressed, she spray tanned me and stuffed my shirt with falsies, saying she was going to swap by costume with her Yoruichi costume at the last minute, because she suddenly wanted to be Soi Fon. She's always pulling jokes like that. H... However, by then, the costume had begun to fuse to me and change me. N... N... Next thing I know, I look like a cheap floozy hooker version of Soi Fon. When she saw how I changed, she freaked out and ran away. I'm so embarrassed!!"

The female Goku said, "I'm Yuzu Arisawa, and the youngest Arisawa sibling. I went to put on my costume, and became this girl Goku. I figure what kept me from becoming a boy was the fact that I refused to remove my undergarments."

The Kirara girl said, "I'm Andrea. I came in with my friend Michelle here and wanted a simple costume, so I grabbed a Kirara ears and tail kit, and now they're real..."

"...And I'm Michelle..." the genuine Miroku uttered. "It seems I'm the only one who put on their costume properly without error or contrivance mucking it up... of course I want to hurry up and fix this. I want to be a girl again!!"

"What's wrong with being a guy?" Greg blurts out.

"Lots of things, especially this dumb sac between your legs. It hurts like hell if it gets hit!!" Michelle retorts.

Akiko says, "Well, from what I can tell, the store locked up as soon as we donned our costumes, as though the owner wanted us to change. It means he had no intent on fixing us, and knew this would happen. Also, there could be other 'victims.'"

"Oh my!!" gasps Andrea.

Akiko goes on, "I also believe, along with the Jewel being real, we may have the genuine powers of the characters we've become."

"Bull..." Greg discounts her.

Akiko however decides to prove her wrong, drawing Suzumebachi. "Sting all enemies to death!! Suzumebachi!!" To everyone's shock but Akiko's, Suzumebachi released into its Shikai form.

Greg gasped, then said, "Then that means my Tessaiga is for real too!!" She draws it, the rusty blade becoming the giant fang the half-demon wields in the manga. "Wind Scar!!" She slashes, sending a demonic slash towards a parked car, blowing it up. "Oh crap!!"

After everyone sprints from sight, they talk again. You say, "Well, we can't stay this way, can we? We have to find the costume shop guy and beat the way to fix this out of him or something?"

Rachel retorts, "But what about that shattered jewel? What if it falls into the wrong hands?" You do realize just how dangerous the Shikon-no-Tama could be, and you swear you feel a shard or two faintly away from you...

What will you guys do?

It was bring your son to work day at the store where my dad works. The place he works just happens to be a costume/cosplay shop. The costume consisted of a pair of fake ears , the prayer bead necklace , and an outfit like he would normally wear. I found my father and asked about it , he told me that if I want to try it on I'd need to talk to his boss.Mr. Wong.
I asked and he said " I'll tell ya what , that costume is very special . If it responds to you then I'll let you have it for free.". I of course asked what he mean by responds . He wasn't listening though , he was to busy getting the costume off the display. Mr . Wong passed it to me then directed me to the changing rooms . I figured he was just trying to get my goat about the "responding" thing so I decided to try it on anyways. I heard the door click behind me then I turned on the light.
I looked down at the costume in my hands , then put it down on a bench. I undressed and started to put on the costume , it was meant for someone a little taller than I was . I took off my shoes , since Inuyasha doesn't actually wear shoes. The necklace and ears went on next , after that I looked into the mirror and saw myself . I looked more or less like Inuyasha , but I had black hair and I was shorter than him.
Then I felt strange , my body started to burn . The ears fell of my head , they were pushed off , by my ears ?! I was turning into Inuyasha !? I ran out of the room . The changes were still going on as I ran to find my Dad , I yelled for him as soon as I saw him. I got about half way down the asile , then I fell to the ground . 115332221222211.title: Toshiro

choices: Stay here and practice your bad-ass powers
Screw that. Power, here I come!
1153322212222111.content:
There's no mistaking it. The traditional Soul Reaper uniform along with the 10th squad haori. This is a Toshiro Hitsugaya costume. It even has an exact replica of his zanpakuto, Hyorinmaru. You take it off the hanger and examine it further.
'Wait, you're thinking, his hair isn't there. That's weird, maybe I should ask the man.'
No sooner then you think that, the old man appears behind you from God knows where, freaking you out in the process.
"May I help you, young man? he asks.
-Actually, yes, you could. It seems there's no wig or anything with the Hitsugaya costume. It's not everyday you see someone walking on the streets with white spiky hair.
-Do not worry, he replies. There's no need for WIGS. As soon as you put on that costume, everyone will know exactly who you are.
-Uhhh, okay, you say, uncertain. Then is there a cabin where I could change?
-Down the hall, you can't miss them," he says, pointing to curtains in the back.

You look in the direction he points to you, wanting to thank him, but he vanishes. Shrugging it off, you go to the cabins to take a look at what you'd look like as a captain. You close the curtain behind you and take off your clothes save for your underwear. You then start putting on the uniform, but it's not that easy, but you make it. Finally, you put on the haori and the sash holding the sword on your shoulders (the sword is on the right side). You have to admit, you look pretty good as a captain, even though the clothes are kinda tight, since they're made for someone Toshiro's size. But then, you feel a tingling sensation that quickly becomes more and more painful and unbearable. You start to sweat intensely and take a look at the mirror in front of you and gasp. You're... SHRINKING?! HOLY CRAP, what's going on? But then you realize that you feel much better, now that you're the same size as the clothes. But the pain is still there and it's still very intense. Suddenly, you feel your arms and legs thin up and your feet shortening, with your whole body becoming much stronger at the same time. You now feel like you can leap over a building. You take a look at your hands and realize they're becoming smaller and more tanned. You look in the mirror and see that your face is now changing, too. Your face takes on a v-shaped form, your eyes are becoming bigger and narrowing, your eyebrows become barely visible and your lips become near non-existant. Finally, the last touch you need for a complete Hitsugaya costume: your hair begins to bleach until it takes a pure snow white color and becomes spiky as hell. Finally, the changes are over and you just stand there, flabbergasted. You take a look at and feel your new body and realize how strong you've become. It seems like you still think as yourself. Suddenly, you want to try out your new powers. You think about that door they make an appearance from when coming from the Seireitei and it suddenly appears in front of you. Excited, you want to step in, but you hesitate. Maybe you should practice your new skills a bit before you immerse yourself into a whole new world. But you really want to go in there. Imagine: being the captain of a whole army that obey your every single command. Wouldn't that be grand? Hmmm, decisions, decisions, decisions. So what will it be?
1153322212222111.title: From hot to cold

choices: Sure, fits my personnality 'Huge creepy grin'

1153322212222112.title: Fight-obssessed maniac

choices: Go to the Seireitei and meet back with the 11th squad
11533222122221121.content: All right. Your biggest inspiration, your favorite Bleach character in the whole wide world without a single doubt, is now hanging in front of you... well, by a hanger. Yep, hanging there is a pitch-perfect costume of the sadistic, combat-obssessed captain Kenpachi Zaraki, the one and only. It includes the whole Shinigami uniform, including his ripped haori, his power-sealing eyepatch and even his broken Zanpakuto who's name is unknown even to you, his biggest fan. Feeling extatic, you take the costume and hurry to the cabins, where you take off your clothes and begin putting on his uniform. Finally, with the haori on you, you take a good look at yourself and try his trademark creepy grin, but it doesn't fit at all on your face, especially with the fact that the clothes were WAY too big for you. Feeling a little disappointed it didn't fit you, you decide to take another costume. But before you can do so, you get caught by a painful burn throughout your entire body. Feeling like you might throw up any minute, you fall on your knees, the pain getting unbearable. You suddenly feel an extraordinary surge of power flowing through you as you see your hands get bigger, your fingers longer and veins popping out. You can feel yourself growing much, MUCH taller, now a whooping 6' 7". After, you feel like you're getting cut from everywhere as you see scars all over you. And then, it dawned: you were now becoming your favorite character, and it looked like you were almost done, as you feel your six-pack chest and your amazing strength through every fiber of your body. You then begin to panic; sure, you're a very big fan of Kenpachi, but not to the point of actually BEING him. You do not want to be as sadistic and obssessed with fighting as he is but it is now too late. Already, the changes reach your face. As your skull reshapes to a v shape, you let a big cry of agony and it seems you now sound exactly like him. Crying in fear, you see your mouth getting larger, your nose getting bigger and your eyes change to a green color, your eyebrows fall down and a scar appear on your left eye. Finally, your hair lenghten and goes up and small bells attach themselves on each of the spikes. You then begin to see memories of bloodscenes and murders. No, these aren't yours, they're Zaraki's. Quickly, you try to remember some of your own memories: your parents, your dog... your loved one, Yachiru, Ikkaku getting beaten by a petty Ryoka. At these thoughts, you can't help but do your creepy smile. What were you doing in a cabin, anyway? Carnage is waiting for you, and so is your squad.

1153322222221.content: You stand unsteadily in front of this... suit. You were never a fan of that overreacting pile of muscles, but you always did think he was kind of funny. Your friend, however, hated Armstrong with a passion and you think of how hilarious it would be to piss him off. You take the costume and hurry to the cabins. Guess there's always some other cos-' But your thoughts get interrupted by a sharp pain all over your body. As you feel your legs getting bigger and stronger, your feet swell into the boots, now perfectly fitting you. Your pants begin to get tight when you realize your waist growing. 'Maybe it's the belt,' you think, loosening it up. After you do so, you feel a little better, but the pain still resides and it's now stronger than ever. You can feel an incredible surge of strength through your upper body as you feel your ribcage expanding, now an incredible six-pack. Next, you arms begin to elongate and get bigger with muscles, your hands thicken, and your fingers elongate. The vest, which was much too big, now fits you like it was tailored for you. You take a look at you in the mirror. Save for the face, you look exactly as Alexander. But not for long. As the pain worsens, you feel your skull reshaping completely as you jawline squarens and widens, nearly all you hair fall off, save for one tuft at the front of your face that changes to blonde, you gain a double chin, your skin becomes rougher, your nose broadens and widens, your eyes change to an ocean blue color and narrow and, finally, you see a mustache grow and curves at the top. At last, the pain stops. You take a good look at yourself, now completely unrecognizable from your old self. You tug the mustache to see if it's real, and you yelp in a much deeper and masculine voice than yours. "Well, you say in your new voice, I can officially say that this is definitely mine, now." As you ponder over your situation, you wonder what you should do now.

choices: The clerk calls if everyything is ok
1153322222222122211111.content:
You decide to try the suit on. You pick it up from the hangar and on your way to changing room you bump into the store clerk.

"Ohh don't rush, the floor is slippery." The clerk giggled. "Here, you are going to need these." She said, handing you the pair of red neural interface clips.

"How..." You tried to ask when she put a finger over your mouth to shush you.

"Don't worry. Just clip them in first before putting on the suit." She advised and went on about her business. You just shrugged blushing like a tomato. The girl was apparently ok with you wearing the girl suit. You Shrugged and continued on your way to the changing room. It was strange. You really didn't know why but you really wanted to try on the suit. You never wanted to wear girls clothing before but the suit strangely compelled you. Was it your crush on the character? What is your love of the anime? Who knows.

You shut the curtain of the changing room behind you and slowly stripped down to your underwear. You looked silly with the suit in hand. Almost like Shinji in episode 8. You chuckled at that thought. Remembering the clips you pinned them to your hair clipping them to few free strands of hair that looked nothing like the hairstyle Asuka had. Remembering Asuka dressed in the suit naked you reluctantly dropped down your underwear. You slowly and carefully not to damage it stepped to the baggy suit and pulled it up to your waist. Then you did exactly the same thing Asuka did. Pulled the suit higher and fit your hands to the gloves. When you were done with both hands the suit rose up to your neck by itself.

You looked incredibly silly wearing the baggy suit. It felt nice on your skin. The soft silk material lining the suit was something you never saw in your life. Then when you were about to take it off you remembered that these suits had to be activated. Surely this wasn't the case... There also wasn't any zipper so what else could it be.

You looked at the six-sided wrist cuff adorned with yellow buttons and you pressed it. You could hear a hiss coming from the life support pack placed on your back as the suit slowly tightened around you. This was different. In the show it was quick. It has to be low on battery or something.

These thoughts quickly left your mind as the suit accelerated and tightened all the way around your body pressing and flattening your crotch and figure to the feminine shape.
1153322222222122211111.title: Try the suit on

11533222222221222111111.content:
You gasp for air as the suit tightens around your ribcage. This is getting uncomfortable and your jewels are getting into the vice. You decide that enough was enough and press the button on the wrist again hoping for the release. Nothing happens as the suit keeps still tightening. You frantically mas the button but to no avail.

You suddenly hear a voice say. "Ziemlich interessant, nicht?" You turn around and behind the curtain to see noone there. You keep trying to get the ever so painful grip of the suit ease on you.

"Suchst du mich?" The voice says as you turn to the mirror to discover the suit has given you a girlish figure.

"Nicht viel anzuschauen huh?" The voice mocks you. Now that the tone of the voice changes, you can recognize it.

"Asuka?" You ask grabbing at your crotch which is slowly going numb with pain.

"Ja, wer wäre das noch?" The voice replies laughing.

"I can't understand you!" You yell.

"Such a boring little boy!" She coys. You double in pain clutching your stomach feeling something twist and turn inside. Like someone wrenches a rag. You look back to the mirror to see ginger streaks in your lengthening hair.

Behind you, you can see laughing redhead dressed in a yellow sundress. You turn around and see noone there. You rub your eyes which are now sky blue in color. She is still there in the mirror.

"So, how does it feel to be blessed with my grace?" She asks.

"What do you mean?" You ask as you feel a loud crack and your hips are suddenly on fire. Your hands go instantly down to hug the source of pain only to feel your hip bones widening and pushing outwards.

"Isn't it obvious mein liebling?"
11533222222221222111111.title: Strange things are afoot

choices: Asuka wakes you up to see more changes
115332222222212221111111.content:
"You are changing to fit my suit of course." As she sais that you bend over in pain as you feel a sharp stabbing pain in your crotch. Your hands slide further down to confirm the disturbing flatness.

"That is much better but you have a long way to go." She gloats as you cough leaving your gloved hands stained with droplets of blood. You look into the mirror and see your facial features shift and rearrange themselves. Your hair now has a distinctly ginger hue and reaches past your shoulders.

"Gute nacht Asuka." You hear her say as you blackout.
115332222222212221111111.title: The changes continue

1153322222222122211111111.content:
"Wake up liebling." You heard Asuka laugh.

"What when how...." You swiftly sat up to face the redhead. You looked around to see that the two of you were in a white void of which the only distinction was a solid white ground you were sitting on in front of each other. You looked down on yourself to see that you were still wearing her plugsuit and still looked like the moment when you passed out.

"Are you stupid? You passed out from the pain you feiges kind." She said irritated.

"But how. What is happening? How can you, you are not real." You say blubbering a bit.

"I am as real as you are dummkopf."

"Hey! don't call me that!" You yelled as your voice cracked into a higher pitch. This caused her no small joy. She laughed at you while you grabbed your throat.

"Yeah like you are going to stop me, soprano boy. Of course, I use the term boy loosely." She said amused.

"Why are you doing this to me?" You asked standing up and checking your crotch to confirm the absence of boy parts. You brushed your long ginger hair out of your face as your hands went to the chest. There was certainly a mass behind the cups but to your relief, there was still too little to fill them completely.

"Mua? Naah. I didn't do a thing mein little Analphabetin. It is that shop you walked into." She explained giggling.

"Reall funny. Could you at least stop laughing?"

"Whatever you want liebchan." She calmed down a bit with an occasional giggle.

"Why are we here? Where is here anyway?"

"This... how to explain. The proper word would be thinny. At least the way you personally perceive it. You are here because of a chance. The store you were in is actually an illusion of a place. You entered a free roaming tear in reality. " Asuka explained.

"Ok but this still doesn't explain what happened to me." You replied absentmindedly. You were brought to the present by a very sensitive part of your newly forming breast brushing on the inside of the suits cup.

"Thinny is reality tear. It is kind of sentient. Some people go mad, some disappear... in your case. You change." You reach to your chest and with a horrified expression discover you are still changing.

"But why you? Why me?" You are asking while inspecting the changes further.

"Bad time bad place? Maybe the right time and the right place. Who knows. I only know that we chose this. You picked the suit ergo we are here." She explained briefly weaving her hand. The shimmering humming wall appeared before you. It looked like liquid metal. You could see in the reflection that now looked identical to her only wearing plugsuit instead of the yellow dress.

She reached to you and adjusted the pins on your head.

"Much better don't you think?" She sais as you turn your back on the metal shimmering wall slapping her hand.

"Don't be mean. After all, not just anyone gets the chance to be me." She said pushing you to the liquid metallic wall.

"Nooo!" You screamed reaching your hand towards her praying she grabs you.
1153322222222122211111111.title: Strange game of fate
