Snap out of it and follow Rei. You reason that if you are wearing plugsuit, there has to be either an angel attack or a sync test. You don't feel up to either, to be honest, but anything is better than angel attack right? With no time to spare you run out of the sliding door. In your rush, you fail to notice brownhaired boy waiting for you in the hallway.

"Scheiße! Cant, you look where..." You stop yourself seeing who exactly you ran into.

"Sorry Asuka I..." He tries to apologize.

"Never mind, let's go before we are too late." You yell heading towards the elevator. He nods and follows behind you. 'Just great! now I have to deal with him.' You think to your self tapping your foot leaning on the elevator wall with the other. You can feel the kinetic shock of the elevator in your gut making you queasy. There is no time to think about who you really are how you got here and how to get back to normal.

The elevator chimed and the door slid open to reveal the holding cages. You leave the boy in the elevator and look around. The sickly smell of what you can only think is LCL penetrates is hanging in the air. You spot the red giant and head towards it. You can hear the boy walking timidly behind you.

As you walk, you are painfully aware of your new anatomy. Your breasts while supported still jiggle a bit in the cups of the suit. Your thighs swish around each other and your hips sway with each step. The hair tickles your neck and whips behind you as you turn your head. Your steps sound hollow on the metal grid walkway extended above the tank of LCL. You sigh and climb to the entry plug. All the clues aarround you tell you that this time it is.
115332222222212221111111111.title: Follow Rei out of the locker room

1153322222222122211111111112.content:
It was clear as day that since the people around you were calm and there was no rush, it was just plain test. You settled into the command seat of the red EVA noticing how soft and comfy the seat was. 'At least I can relax a bit.' You thought as the orange liquid poured at your feed and slowly rose up.

"Ohh hell no!" You yelled trying to hold your breath. You failed and choked a bit on the liquid before your lungs fully filled. 'Fuck! That felt like drowning!'

"Everything alright Asuka?" Said the blond on the screen that just popped up in front of you.

"Yeah." You said trying it to sound convincing and failing. You made yourself comfortable in the seat once again. Trying to relax and tune out all the sensations your uncomfortably alien body sent you proved to be fruitless. Your mind wondered. You could feel the presence of the EVA but just barely.

"Asuka your sync ratio is down 4 points. What are you doing? Concentrate harder." Asked head scientist of project E.

"I am trying to." You replied. This was really messed up. You had much more important issues to think about. You gripped the controls tighter and the material of the suit creaked rubbing against the rubberized metal handles. This was going to be a long day.

After a while, you managed to raise back up your ration. You wondered how is this possible. 'This Isn't my EVE. I am not Asuka! Does the EVA think I am her or am I really her?' You suddenly noticed that you didn't breathe for a while. 'It has to be the LCL. Shinji was right. It really smelled like blood.'

After what felt like days you climbed out of the entry plug soaked with raging headache and grumpy as a wolverine. You swiftly made your way over the platforms to the elevator not waiting for others. You managed to score your ratio on top of the three and it bothered you more than if it dropped through the basement to the raging hell. It meant that the EVA and more importantly miss Soryu considered you to be her daughter.

"Wait Asuka!" Shinji called and stuck his hand to the door just in time to stop the elevator. You gritted your teeth and grumbled a little. 'That god damn idiot! How dare he stop the elevator!'

"Congratulations on coming on top again." He said as he pressed the button for the door to close. 'God this guy was irritating. It was like he was hitting on you!' You stood there looking pissed off dripping with LCL that was slowly pooling under both of you.

"Here! You forgot your towel." He handed you the red towel with 02 embroidered on it." You forgot to notice he even held it in your rage. Still, it's not like you...

"Thank you." Came out of your mouth in the end. both of you went to your respective changing rooms. It was strange for you to follow the red female symbol. You went to the showers discarding the towel to the bin at the door. You put on the hot water and just relaxed. The feeling of the nasty orange substance washing away was heavenly and your new body reacted accordingly.

Inside, on the other hand, you were a bundle of nerves. You just couldn't take it anymore. You slid down along the tyled wall and sat in the shower crying. You had no idea how to get home. No Idea how to get your body back and ost of all. You knew what the future holds for you if you stay here in this body. You thought about slashing your wrists open right there but the thought of what would happen if you failed disgusted you. That helpless little weeb would just love to wank over your sedated body. The body you feared to live in. You didn't even want to take off that suit knowing what you have to deal with.

Suddenly the albino girl walked in the showers and picked the shower next to you as the orange gunk rained down to the ground from her pristine white suit. She then unsealed her suit and slowly peeled it off of her. Your eyes wandered towards her. You felt dirty but you liked what you saw and your new body reacted accordingly. 'Screw this! Now I am lesbian!' You thought while averting your eyes from the clone next to you.

"Is something wrong pilot Soryu?" Asked the blue haired girl.

"No!" You replied withount flinching.
1153322222222122211111111112.title: Synch test

After all, you could smell it on you ever since this happened. Carefully washing the stench of blood and crusted LCL off your hair you instinctively reach for the other bottle. Running silky smooth, your hair feels finally clean.

You look down at yourself, then at your wrist. You unseal the suit and pull it down revealing pale smooth skin. Yanking the hands of the gloves and pulling the suit down to your waist is a relief. Shortlived one as you look down at yourself and see a pair of perky breasts sitting on your chest. You could feel them through the suit all those hours in the EVA but now and out in the open, you can feel how sensitive they are as the water slides over you.

11533222222222221221.content:
You bundle the transparent suit on your arm and rush back to the main path between the aisle, craning your neck around until you spot a sign leading to the changing rooms. Without a second thought you beeline right to them and shut the door. You look down at your arm, where you can feel the bodysuit rest but it looks like nothing is there... Your not sure how this thing works, it hurts your brain just trying to fathom it so you just throw all the aside and decide to put it on. You hang up the suit and carefully remove the bag of accessories, after all if the suit fell off the hanger it would be a pain in the ass to find.

"So what's in here anyway?" You open up the accessories and pull out the boots, socks, and gloves. They look nearly identical to the ones from the show, which was a nice attention to detail. The small black Choker you spotted earlier was next, it seemed like a simple strap with a disk in the middle. On one side of the disc it had the text 'Over throat' written. Curious you place the disc to your throat, it sits pretty comfortably there so it seemed it wouldn't be intrusive. "Wonder why i-" You pull it away in shock... that was a girl's voice! "A voice changer? What the hell is this a spy movie?" you mutter in your normal tone as you stare at the innocuous choker. Despite your outburst the thought of it all it pretty amazing. You put the little device through it's paces, placing it and removing it randomly as you talk and every time it smoothly transitions between the girl voice and your own, no glitches or anything. After a moment you shrug. "Why not, at least this way if I run into anyone I know they won't question why I'm in the girl's section." Your voice raises in pitch mid-sentence as you lock the choker in place. You can feel in there but its not intrusive. Now onto the main event.

You strip out of you shirt, socks, and Jeans before turning to the hanger on the door. You carefully reach out to grab the bodysuit, making sure not to lose track of it. It's a bit of an ordeal to find the opening again and it takes a bit more to find the zipper... the invisible zipper. Zipping it down leaves you looking into a hole in space, You do your best not think about it as you step inside and watch your leg disappear. You have to feel around a bit to find the leg hole but once you do the material slides along easily. It's soft but stretchy, It feels really nice on your skin. You've never felt anything quite like it. Once one leg was safely inside with no adverse effect you sat down to put your other leg in. A bit of shimmying and a few tugs and you were now just a floating torso. Catching a glance at your bizarre reflection gets a chuckle out of you, though thanks to the choker is comes out as a girlish giggle. This strange disconnect only makes you laugh harder, needing to take a minute for you to calm down.

Here it got a bit more challenging, as once you got your first arm into the sleeve all the way down to the fingers you lost track of where your arm was. After a bit of flailing around and high pitched curses you managed to get both arms all the way in. Frowning for a moment you pause and look to the gloves sitting off to the side. "I guess these really do have a use..." you mused lightly as you carefully paw at the pile until you can grab them. Once the gloves were on and you were able to see your hands again the rest of the dressing process was much easier.

You got the material tight against your chest and reached back to start zippering up, as it passed the material tightened comfortably until you were just a floating head and gloves. You could feel the face mask resting against your chest. The idea of sticking your head into a void in space took a lot more courage then the rest. "It's okay, it's just a costume." your nerves making your high pitched voice trill even higher. Holding your breath you pull it up over your face. Inside was darkness, enough that you could feel yourself start to panic but once you pulled it tight against your face everything cleared up as if you weren't wearing anything. You zip it up and look to the mirror all you can see in a pair of floating gloves. With an unseen smile you wave watching the gloves respond in kind, not even the slightest visual hint of your limbs or body.

"Woah... This is so cool." you 'squeal' excitedly and then feel awkward. Maybe the choker was a bit much but for now you leave it be. You sit back down and grab a sock before realizing once again you can't see your feet. "Oh, hehe. Right." having to trace the sock down your body to the foot you can't help but enjoy the sensation. This material is fantastic... Repeating the process with the other you can't help but feel accomplished as you wiggle your now visible toes. "I wonder if Tooru had to go through this growing up..." you muse softly, feeling a bit of sympathy for the character. She's very much a joke character in the series but she must have some strength to get by in the day to day and stay so cheerful. Tying your boots you stand up and look at the floating gloves and boots once more before offering the mirror a V with your fingers as Invisible girl often would.

"Beat this costume Jeff! Ha!" You challenge the reflection, baring a wide grin known only to you...

They have some cool stuff here." you admit unable to hide the bemused tone in your voice.

"Anime Section." You admit immediately

"But if your looking for cool changes I could recommend you some choices." If they had an actual invisible suit you could only imagine what the others could do.

"Right, I'll think about it..." she swallowed awkwardly "I just, wasn't expecting to run into another girl in the dressing room like this." she continued trying to sound conversational as you felt a chill down your spine. The Voice Changer... You'd started tuning out the difference so you'd nearly forgotten. If she found out you were actually a guy from her class, it could get messy

"I mean I can go if it's a prob-"

"No, you were here first I'm the one that barged in." she replied reasonably. "There's plenty of room anyway, it's just use girls right?" she said starting to relax before offering a genuine smile. "My name's Alice. What's yours?"

115332222222222212212112.content:
"Bri-ana! The Name's Briana." You falter slightly almost saying your real name out loud. Fortunately with the suit on you give no physical tells to your lie. Putting all of your focus into calming your voice you add in. "But you can call me Bree!" your tone is cheerful an unassuming even as you face is no doubt a wreck of nerves.

"Well nice to meet you Bree," Alice said with pleased smile, apparently taking your words at face value. "What brought you by the store?"

"Well there's a costume party coming up-" so say before you can stop yourself and her face lit up in surprise.

"You're going to Jake's Party too?" you blink in surprise, you didn't even know Jake knew this girl. "Do you live around here?"

"Ah, no I'm in from out of town actually for the weekend." your impressed at how easy that came out, with Alice not being able to actually see you you become more and more confident in your lies. Your not sure if that's a good thing or a bad thing. "I've known Jake since he was a kid, we just don't get to meet up as much these days."

"Oh, cool. So you're close then?" she said a bit more subdued. It was subtle but maybe you were so amped right now you noticed... or maybe since she couldn't see your features she wasn't hiding her own expressions as well. Either way Curious. wait... did she? You grin mischievously under the face mask...

"Not as much as we used to, we mostly just chat online. I'm kinda coming by as a surprise." you say in a bemused tone, "All the more reason to go incognito mode. How do you know Jake?" you ask innocently watching her very closely.Your not sure why you care so much, it really wasn't any of your business. You should be finding some excuse to leave so you can change back out and avoid embarrassment... despite all that you can't help yourself, you're filled with an insatiable curiosity and your sole target is Alice.

"Well, not really. I share a bunch of classes with him at school." she admitted slowly, eyes glancing away from your general direction. "We haven't talked much but he stood up for me when some other girls were giving me a hard time. Then he just suddenly invited me to come to the party." she sounded surprised herself and a little happy.

"Aww, that was sweet of him." in your mind that had been more sarcastic and teasing but by the time it left your mouth you sounded genuinely touched... and if your were honest with yourself you kinda were, Jake was your friend for a reason after all. Good on him.

"Yeah..." Alice agreed softly, briefly cracking a smile. oh yeah, she liked him. "I've never gone to a costume party, but it sounds like fun. Admittedly I really had no idea what to wear... when I heard about this place and it's special costumes I thought maybe I could find something that would give me some more... I don't know. Confidence?" she looked to the large pile of outfits she had gathered and sighed. "Though I'm not sure I can even try these on, they really aren't me at all."

"Isn't that the whole point of a Costume though, to be someone else." You chime in without missing a beat, the irony heavy in the air though you ignore it as you stand and your surprised. She wasn't nearly as short as you thought she was. She was only few inches shorter then you. You push that aside and step forward placing your gloved hand on her shoulder, she turns your way but obviously doesn't know where your face is. "Don't worry about what people thank and just find something fun to wear! I'm sure we can find plenty of outfits that would look super cute on you." you exclaim cheerfully... wait we? Did you just volunteer yourself?

"Well... If you really think so." Alice seemed overwhelmed by the enthusiastic support. "Thanks Bree..." she said softly, offering you a small genuine smile.

"Glad to help!" your voice is confident but your face is resigned, looks like you'll been keeping this up a while longer... She turns to the pile of costumes and gives a nervous giggle.

"I brought so many I don't even know where to start." she offers you a sideways glance. "Do you want to try some on too?"

"Eh?" is all you can vocalize as panic sets in. Once again your glad your expression is hidden because your not sure how deep you've dug yourself now.

"Please, If I have someone else to do it with I won't be as Embarrassed... I know we don't really know each other but..." she trailed off looking down.

"Freaking amazing," you exclaim excitedly. "I've never felt so strong, I feel like I could take out the whole football team with my bare hands."

"Really?" she placed a hand over her mouth. "Then... could we swap?" she asked hopefully.
11533222222222221221211222.title: Warrior Princess 'Bree"

choices: Stop stalling and Try to put on the Lolita dress
Look to the pile for something more appatizing
115332222222222212212112221.content:
Your not exactly thrilled with the idea of putting on the dress but you already had the costume you were planning to wear, this dress up session was about helping Alice out. You had promised... So with great reluctance you relented. "Sure, why not." you say in a more casual tone then you feel, but you new alto voice seems to give the statement a level of authority. As you actually have to untie the back stings of the breastplate not that it fits so snuggling to your curves, shimmying it off your hips and to the floor... you can't help but notice that your not changing back... "Um Alice, I'm still all amazon..."

"Yeah, I heard from the owner that you can only change back by putting your own clothes on when your done..." she replied in her squeaky child voice as she managed to slip out of the layers of frills. Leaving just a little girl in her underwear. "As long as you don't leave the store in costume or mix costumes you can always change back."

"Oh good, i was getting worried there for a moment." your light giggles being replaced with a husky chuckle that you had to remind yourself was coming from you. You made a mental note not to mix and match any of the costumes, your invisible body suit not I even coming to mind as a 'costume' in it's own right... It's probably fine.

The arm bands and bracers were easy enough and before long you were once again in just in the bodysuit, though now with a much more impressive body, you a finger along your flexing bicep, the hard corded muscle under the smooth suit giving a pleasant feeling. You actually had a defined set of abs! but looking to the small childlike dress on the bench you know it's going away. Alice was already pulling the breastplate over it, it was comically large. If she crouched down she'd probably be able to hide inside... at least until the costumes magic began to trigger. She began to grow in rhythmic spurts, body tensing with each one to keep herself from falling. With each spurt she looked stronger, fiercer imposing. It took less then a minute before she was eyes to eye with you, a mature hardened woman rather then the frail child she'd been moments earlier. it was night and day even from her original form...

"Woah...That was a rush." Alice said in a shaky voice, a ghost of a smile sneaking on to her lips.

"Just wait till you try the arm bands." you say knowingly taking advantage of your Invisibility to get a good look of Alice's new more athletic form and it's quite nice but lacking your usual equipment the rush of arousal is hard to get used to, but it wasn't unpleasant.

"Don't forget your costume Bree," she reminded locking her first arm band in place, her arms visibly gaining definition. "Oooh."

"Right..." you pick up the child sized dress and raise a transparent eyebrow. "That being said I have no idea how I'm going to fit in this."

"Your body will figure out a way."
115332222222222212212112221.title: Sure why not, your trying to help Alice anyway

choices: Long Invisible Hair still hangs past your shoulders.
You still feel that incredible strength
1153322222222222122121122211.content:
You can't help but feel a bit silly as you find a way to fit the tiny dress on your adult, muscled form. Placing it over your head you can feel the dress stop at your broad shoulders, offering s light sigh. This was just ridiculous. "I don't think this is going to-" as you start to vocalize your frustration your hit with a massive bout of vertigo. You her spins as you feel like you falling despite feeling both feet on the ground. The hem of the dress seems to expand rapidly. slipping over your bare shoulders can further down. The breasts and muscle melting away until your nearly covered by the cloth. You fight and scrambled until your head pops out through the neckline of the dress with a gasp.The fresh air seeming to settling the uneasy feeling... Though the realization is replaced with shock as you take in your surroundings. everything is huge!

"Aww you’re so small now." Alice’s voice causes you to crane your neck up to see your amazonian classmate. Even as she crouched down she still loomed large, a mature woman in front of a child. "I kinda wish i could have sent that change without the invisibility." she admitted with a low chuckle and you could feel your face heat up. You felt simultaneously embarrassed and vulnerable in the presence of the warrior woman.

"It’s... certainly something." your voice rings like a small bell, higher than even the voice changer had placed it due to your newly gained youth. You touch your throat without really thinking about it and your hand freezes and you feel your smooth neck... The Voice changer was gone, you didn't feel it fall off. It was inside the body suit so it should be pretty obvious if it did. Maybe since your currently a girl it's not needed?

But you can't help but feel there’s something more to it... It's not visible due to the body suit but you've gotten more and more attune with perceiving yourself without visual cues. On top of the young girl form your still have a trait left over from the Amazon outfit!

Was this what Alice meant by mixing costumes?

Alice thanked you profusely and she picked out her favorites and went to purchase, promising to catch back up at the party.

You agreed and waved her off, one last lie for the mountain you'd been building, you were now alone once more. You quickly lock the door to have no more surprises. You've definitely gotten used to to not seeing your hands in all this. Though you couldn't see your self you could feel that your body had changed... Long hair seemed both in and outside of the skin suit trailing down past your pert bottom, you could no longer feel the drag of body hair against the suit. You'd slimmed out considerably, save for your chest, and felt you may have even lost some height somewhere along the way...

Even your mind was jumbled, a mish-mash of knowledge from many different cultures and fictional settings clouded your thoughts. But you'd seen it when Alice put her normal clothes back on. She had changed back to normal. Once you got this off and put your clothes back on everything would be fine.

That one was the only thought could keep you from screaming...

You reached behind your head for the zipper to undo the invisible skin suit.

121311.content:
You inspected the arm ours separately and chose the assault model, the arbiter seemed to be lots of leather straps anyway. You asked one of the employees how much it was and they replied, "well... How about you try it on first?" And pointed to the dressing rooms. You nodded ok, and he pulled it off display. You wondered why they would give you the display model rather than a stored model in the back, but didn't bother thinking about it too much.

You dragged the armor into the dressing room and laid it out, piece by piece. The elite suit seemed to include something similar to a wetsuit. You unclothed to your underwear and put the wetsuit on, making sure it fitted tightly. First you put on the foot armor, which clamped onto the wetsuit without trouble. Next, you put on the knee and thigh armor, which strapped around your leg uncomfortably. Then came the arms and the wrists, which seemed too loose and too tight in some places. The chest piece followed, which didn't even extend to your stomach. Finally, the helmet, which sat sadly on your head, wobbling loosely.

You looked in the mirror for a while, looking the costume over. It didn't fit you well, and you were about to take it off, until you had a shocking pain everywhere across your body. The helmet clanked on the ground when you fell, but the shock at least put you back in control of your muscles. You stood up in front of the mirror, and watched your face, the only part of skin not covered by the wetsuit, was turning grey.

You panicked. At first you thought maybe you had a concussion when you fell, but the next events were surreal. The wetsuit got tighter and tighter, until it felt like it disappeared, but, looking down, you noticed that the wetsuit had become your skin; grey, smooth, and lacking some anatomy. The surprise made you jump, but looking in the mirror you saw your jaw split. Just by seeing it, you seemed to experience excruciating pain that you hadn't noticed before.

'Keep your mind off it, your hallucinating!' You thought to yourself, denying the anomaly. You looked down at your hands, and your ring and little fingers instantly fused into another thumb! You screamed in a voice of an elite. Looking back in the mirror, you noticed your face was complete, and you were scared, more scared than you could describe.

Your feet began to hurt now, and you seemed to react by standing on your tip-toes. Your toes fused into two larger ones on each foot, which seemed to provide perfect balance. You examined your reflection closely and in disbelief, wondering if this had really happened or not. You took of all the armor to see if it would fix it, and tried to peel off your skin, thinking maybe it was still a wetsuit. You couldn't even feel the underwear you were wearing anymore, which on closer investigation had appeared on the dressing room bench beside you. You reluctantly put all the armor back on, lastly the helmet, which shone in the light from the overhead lamp.

You walk to the front of Sonic the hedgehog costume, which is a familiar light blue skin with a pair of big red shoes with white lines on its feet. What a cheap costume! You quickly pay for the costume and take it home. After you walk out the shop, the seller grins with his soft voice, "wish you will like your NEW life."
After a few minutes you arrive home. You quickly run to your room and lock the door inside. You unzip the zipper hidden near the back of the Sonic's ear and undress yourself quickly. Then you put your left leg into its pretty thin leg. When you foot finally get into Sonic's foot, you fell strange, just like there is a kinda power engulfing your foot. Finally, you use your arms which are inside the blue arms of Sonic to put your head inside the Sonic's head and zip up the zipper to your costume's ear. When you finish, you suddenly feel a pain on your whole body. At first you can hardly feel that you body is changing, but a few seconds later you feel that your body is melting with the costume! You are scared and want to stop the changing, but in vain. It is too hard for you to move. A few minutes later, you feel the change stops. You open your eye, and see a blue-skin hedgehog with a pair of red and white shoes looks at you in his green eyes. You are surprised at first that Sonic the hedgehog is looking at you, but then you found that it is a mirror! Actually, you ARE the Sonic the hedgehog!
You want to go back to the shop to ask for help, but you suddenly remembered that the seller tell you "NO REFUND AND EXCHANGE". You finally know what it means. It means that you can not take off the costume, for the zipper after YOUR ear has disappeared. Your old body does not exist. You are Sonic.

125132221122121.content:
You walk to the dressing rooms, going to try it on. It didn't look like it would fit that well, but being the only one you decided to try it on before choosing something else. Closing the door behind you, you slip it on. It fits comfortably, and you have no trouble with it, to your surprise. An odd feeling comes over you; it's warm and fuzzy while at the same time cold and dark. You close your eyes, falling into the feeling...

The darkness feels much easier, but you don't like it...

You can hear voices...or is it just one voice? They're telling you to go to the darkness, but you try and ignore them...

With your efforts, the warmth pushes back the darkness...

Locking it away...

But it's still there...

You open your eyes, shaking your head. What was that? Remembering the feelings you had when you picked up the costume, you notice that they're... well, not gone, but separate, as though having two minds. The darker one was pushed back. That was...good, you suppose.
With that out of the way, you notice something. Everything is bigger. Did it grow somehow?

Or did you change?

You panic a bit, turning suddenly towards the mirror. Mephiles the Dark stares back at you. You take a few deep breaths, calming down. Obviously, something happened to make you change. You must have shrunken to Mephiles's height, about 3 feet tall. You decide not to ponder on the Dark mind as you leave the room quickly.

__
Said Dark mind was currently locked into your subconscious. Mephiles paced the 'room', wondering what exactly had happened. The room was actually just an apparent blackness with invisible walls, ceiling and floor. The only actual feature was a heavy metal door with several locks on the other side of it. There was only one he could open, which needed a key...

He had been dead not too long ago. Sucked into the oblivion of nothingness; an unknown science experiment at birth and death. The only thing left at his end was his spirit, floating endlessly for eternity. Until he wasn't. Almost as though his soul was being sewn into his new body, he was back. But he couldn't do anything. He thought he had a chance when you picked him up, but it was taken away, and he was once again trapped...for now...
__
You now had a dilemma. In an unfamiliar body, both to yourself and those around you, what were you supposed to do?

1253211221121.content:
Among the myriad of Link costumes, one stood out above them all: Link's wolf form, the game mechanic that made you love Twilight Princess in the first place. You took it down from its hook, a smile cracking across your face. "I think I'll go with this one," you told the clerk.
"A good choice, that," he replied. "The changing rooms are in the back, if you'd like to try it on before buying."
You nodded, then made your way towards the location he had indicated. Stepping into the first unoccupied room, you closed the door behind you and begin putting the suit on. The first thing to be worn was the body, with amazingly soft fur, digitigrade leg padding, and a bouncy tail attached to the rear. After this came the two feet, which fit snugly over your own, then the four-fingered hand paws. Brushing a strand of hair away from your eyes, you grabbed the costume's head and placed it over your own, adjusting it carefully until you could see out the eyes. Everything fit properly!
Looking at your reflection in the mirror, you took a moment to appreciate the mastery with which the costume was made. But something in the corner of the mirror caught your eye. Gazing down by your feet, you saw a chain and shackle, the final piece to completing the look. "Must have dropped it," you muttered to yourself, stooping down to pick it up. "Now, which wrist did it go on?"
Remembering the answer to that question, you placed the plastic prop over the suit's left wrist, snapping it into place. Oddly enough, as you hold your hand out to inspect the shackle, it grew heavier on your wrist, as if the grey plastic was turning into the iron it was supposed to mimic.
Then you realized that it actually was turning into iron, the smooth surface gradually becoming shinier and more textured, much to your confusion.
Confusion soon turned to panic, however, as the room started to get fuzzy around you. Beginning to feel strange and unsteady, you lifted your hands upward, but were unable to remove the costume's head - you're arms were becoming weaker by the second, and the inside of the mask seemed to be tightening around you. Finding it difficult to stand any longer, you collapsed to the floor. As the room faded to darkness...

1253222112.content:
You spot a costume that appears to be based on Princess Zelda, as she appeared in The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess. You almost immediately dismiss it, laughing at the idea of dressing up as a girl. However, something pulls you back. Something about that purple and white dress, those gold trinkets, that brown wig, it made you want it. You had never really considered crossdressing before, aside from as a joke, but right now, the option was looking more and more appealing.

You look around to make sure no one is watching, before taking the Zelda costume off the rack. As nice as it had looked hanging up, it felt even better in your hands. There was no going back now. That said, you were still a bit embarrassed about this, and didn't feel ready to put on a dress in public yet, so you decide against trying it on in the changing room. Instead, you pick one that seems about your size, and head straight to the counter, hoping no one sees you on the way. You quickly hand the costume to the man at the counter, trying to avoid eye contact with him. Maybe it was just your mind playing tricks on you, but you could have sworn you saw him crack a smile at seeing the costume you had chosen. You pay him, and he puts the costume in a bag for you, along with a few other things.

"I've thrown in a few extras," he explains, "Free of charge. Just a couple things to make the costume more convincing. Have a nice day."

"You too," you mumble, quickly leaving the shop, taking your new purchase with you. You have a little look inside the bag he had given you your costume in, and discover that the "extras" he had given you seemed to be things to help you appear more feminine, so you didn't just look like a guy crossdressing while wearing the costume. This seemed to include makeup and a pair of breast forms, among other things.

You make it home without incident, and quickly rush up to your room so no one sees you and asks what you bought. After closing and locking your door, you empty the contents of the bag, and lay it all out neatly on your bed. All the extras the store clerk had given you seemed like they might take a while to get it all on, along with the costume. Now you had a choice to make; you could either put the costume on now, making sure you had plenty of time to get everything ready, and maybe some time left over to get used to walking around in a dress, or you could wait until you actually went to the party, and change into your costume there, making sure only people at the party would see you dressed like that, allowing you to play it off as a joke to your friends, and avoiding embarrassment.

You pull the costume off the rack, turning it around you see the costume is in different parts; held together by some pins and straps, void of labels and tags.
Looking for help you down towards the store clerk with the costume slung over your shoulder "How much is this? There doesn't seem to be a price on it".
The clerk rolls around the edge of the counter "well let's see what we have here". He eases the costume out of your hands and props it on the counter. "Ah yes, this is the Wakka costume from Final Fantasy X. Have you played the game?" You nod "I'm actually in the middle of playing it, I keep getting dying to one of the bosses." "Seymour Flux?" "Is that the one on the mountain?" "Ha yea, the very same. That's a big wall for a lot of people, keep at it."

Enjoying the company your focus returns to the costume. "So, how much is it?" The clerk thinks for a second "I need to check the database to see, but in the meantime try it on to see if it fits!"
"Fair enough, where are the changing rooms?" "Down at the back, on the right"
Pulling the costume from the counter you head down to the changing rooms as the clerk typed away on the store computer.

You see that the two cubicles are vacant and enter the one closest to the entrance and shut the door behind you.
You hang up the costume and to strip down to your underwear.
Opening the seal on the costume you see that there is a lot more to the it than what you had initially thought. Pulling out the pieces one at a time you lay them out of the bench beside you. A wig with an attached blue headband, forearm and arm guards, sandals weighted at the bottom of the costume bag, yellow slips for the pants with straps on top, black shorts with an attached belt and compression shorts, and what could only be described as a stripper top.

"First thing is first." You grab the black shorts and begin to pull them up over your underwear but for some reason they were not rising any higher than the ends of your undergarments "Eh?"
Closer examination shows that the compression shorts are too tight to be worn with any other clothing. Dropping the shorts and thinking for a moment "Well..." You shrug and pull down your underwear. Bare to the mirror before you, you quickly pull the black shorts up to your waist with ease. You tighten the belt around the waist and pull on the yellow slips over the shorts and attach the straps to the top of the shorts.
Quickly slipping on the top piece and sandals you pause at the complexity of the two arm pieces. The smaller of the two slips past your right hand and onto your forearm with little hassle but the other arm piece required some effort. Pulling at the top of the piece you manage to drag it up to near the top of your left shoulder and squeeze your hand into the glove slot the rest of the way.

Your turn to the mirror and examine yourself "it doesn't look the same without the hair" you doubt your choice of costume. You grab the wig with attached headband and strap it onto your head. You not and non nonchalantly begin to flex despite lacking any real sense of muscle. Your voice cracks a bit as you laugh at how different you look with the costume on.

Now you were really panicking. Not only had you been transported into a fictional world, while cross-dressing no less, but you now had no way of returning home, at least as far as you could tell. You answered it and found out Sly Cooper has been seen in town. You start to leave.

After waiting a few more minutes, he realizes what has happened and goes back to the front desk and starts to make a phone call in order to tell you about how the costume works.

Back at Interpol...

1253322222222221212.content: You leave the office and get ready to go outside. As you do you run into someone. Who was it?
1253322222222221212.title: Neyla or Inspector Fox

choices: says, "Before we go after Cooper, I think we should plan this out a bit."
asks, "What do you know about a costume that looks like me?"
12533222222222212121.content:
You came across Carmelita out in the hallway. "You must be the new recruit. Wait, you look familiar. Who..." she begins. Right then, the phone in her office rings. "I'll get that then we can go after Cooper.," she tells you. She then enters the room you just left.

Meanwhile in her office, Carmelita answers her phone. "Hello, this is Carmelita speaking. How may I help you?" she says.

"Hi, I'm a costume shop owner. I just opened shop today. Anyway someone was trying one of my costumes, but vanished from my shop. I get the feeling he's in your world now," the costume shop owner replies.

"Wait, he stole the costume?" Carmelita asked.

"I don't think he did it intentionally. Anyway, I was going to give him a few costumes for free since he was the first person to enter my shop, so that was no big deal," he tells her.

"If it's no big deal, then why did you call me?" Carmelita asked.

"There are somethings I was going to tell him before he vanished. Like how he could enter your world while wearing the costume by thinking about it, how he'll go back to his world when the costume is removed or he thinks about it wearing the costume, how he can bring someone from your world back to his world if he wanted to," he explained.

"Well this is interesting. Hold on, let me write this down so I can give it to him," She replies as she grabs a pen and a sheet of paper and start writing it down. After she finishes writing it down, she asks "So tell me, what does this costume look like?"

"It was a fox character with long blue hair. I believe it was supposed to be you," he answers.

She thinks about what he just said, then it sinks in. "I think I encountered him not too long ago. I'll be sure to tell him," she replies.

"Thank you. I need to get back to business now. Customers could come in at any time. Bye," he says as hangs up the phone.

Carmelita also hangs up the phone and puts the note in her jacket pocket, then she goes back into the hall and tells you there is something she needs to talk to you about. Then she leads you to her office and closes the door behind you. Then she...
12533222222222212121.title: The real Inspector Fox

125332222222222121212.content:
"She knows about the costume, this is not good," you think. Then you answer, "I might know something, but I have a few questions before I try to provide you with answers.' You noticed your voice has changed since you put the costume on.

"Okay, go ahead," she says.

"Where did you hear about that costume? Am I in any kind of trouble or danger? " you ask her.

"That phone call was from the costume shop owner. If you're the one with the costume, there are somethings you need to know. Anyway, you're not in trouble or danger." She answered.

"Well, I'm glad I'm not in trouble or anything. Anyway, I am wearing the costume you mentioned," you reply.

She gave you the paper from her pocket and explained what he told her to you.

"That information is useful. I can take the costume off by visualizing it coming off and I can bring someone back to my world if we are touching like holding hands," you say thinking about it. Then you ask her, "If we manage to catch Sly Cooper, would you want to come back to my world?"

"Yes, I am wanting to know more about what's going on, but catching Cooper is a higher priority right now. Once that's done, I'll go back with you" she answers.

You both leave the police station and head into the city. Who finds Sly first?
125332222222222121212.title: She knows? How could this end good?

choices: Sly finds you before Carmelita arrives.

1253322222222221212121.content:
You and Carmelita split up to search the city for Sly Cooper. After about 10 minutes, you hear a familiar voice say, "Tagging Carmelita's police badge was a great idea. I have made it this far without running into her yet and I'm almost at the target." You shoot your shock pistol into the air to signal to Carmelita you found Sly. She sees the signal and starts heading your way. "Bentley, I thought you said Carmelita's on the other side of side of town. How did she get here?" Sly asked Bentley.

"What do you mean by that? The tracking device says she's across town, but she's headed your way now," Bentley replies.

"I saw a shot fired from her shock pistol nearby. Unless you're saying her badge and shock pistol are in two different parts of the city, something is wrong here." Sly explained.

"Do you really think she's the only person with a shock pistol? I imagine those things are selling rather well. By definition, it's a stun gun. It could just be some security guard," Bentley answered.

"Yes, but how many security guards tried to bring me in alive?" Sly asked.

"Good point. Okay, fine. If you want to check it out, go ahead. If she's not already there, it's just a matter of time before she is. You should make it quick," said Bentley.

"All right, I'll check it out," Sly says.

125332222222222222222121.content:
You're not entirely sure what brought you to start seriously looking through the Touhou section, after all nearly the entire cast was female. As costumes though they had some pretty cool outfits, besides none of them would fit you anyway. You look closer at the nearby costumes and frown... every single one is marked 'One Size fits All. Guaranteed'.

"Eh, why not?" You were less then convinced but you also had time to kill. You pluck a costume off the rack at random and give it a quick once more. "Flandre huh? It looks pretty accurate." Someone really went to the effort of getting all the details... and just like the others that bold promise. One Size fit's All... time to put it to the test. Shouldering the costume you work your way out of the Touhou section getting an odd look from a girl who was pursuing the section. You pay her no mind. This was for science. You find the closest batch of dressing rooms and head inside locking the door behind you. The Costume comes in three pieces.

-A pair of red Mary Janes with frilled socks
-Flandre's signature red dress and Soft pink undershirt
- her pink mob cap tied off with a red ribbon.

With a shrug you decide to dive right in. You peel off your tee shirt and pick up the child-sized dress looking for any way to loosen any of the bits but it's all connected together, even the oversized back bow is sown in... the only way to put it on would to someone pull it on over your head. It seems like a tall order... but they said 'guaranteed' so you duck in under the hem and put one arm up into the tiny dress.

It's far too small as you expected... but when you push you find you're able to get a bit further in. Despite feeling like there's no give you always seems to push further in... It's a strange feeling as your having to fight it the whole way and after a minute you shimmying and struggling you can barely see. But somehow your making progress. So you keep pushing, your able to make enough room with your arms to get your head into the torso and feel something dragging down your hip and thighs, pooling at your knees. Seems like you pants came loose, so troublesome... somehow you manage to free you legs without falling and into the process get your right arm to start fitting in the sleeve. The left arm soon follows with with your arms leaving there's more space to pull the dress down further.

"Almost..." Your voice it muffled but off, higher maybe? You throw it aside for now as you managed to get your head all the way up the to the neck opening... Your arms are free and after feeling around you find a couple small buttons you can undo, It's delicate work but once you finish you have enough wriggle room to make one last push. You gasp deeply as your head pops out the neck how and the dress settles on your frame... surprisingly comfortable after all that fighting. The shoulder span was fine, the sleeves only traveled slightly down your upper arm and poof outward cutely. You can feel the tickle of lace on your bare knees. It fits.

"Huh, what do ya know-" you say impressed before grabbing your throat, your voice definitely doesn't sound right... You turn to the mirror and have you rub your eyes to make sure your seeing things right. You looked younger, no older then 12. With slender hairless limbs, your face was still identifiable as you but had softer features that matched your current appearance better. Your not done changing, even as you watch your reflection you can see yourself loosing inches and muscle mass... You get it now. The clothes don't stretch to fit the wearer. The wearer gets changed to fit the clothes. "This is so surreal." You touch the mirror just to make sure it's actually there. You glance back to the Hat sitting innocently on the bench of the changing room...
125332222222222222222121.title: Yes

choices: Grap the Eye in your hand
Ignore it and grab your clothes
1253322222222222222221211.content:
You stare at the hat for a moment before slowly approaching the bench and picking it up... What was a Touhou character without her head accessory after all. You turn and walk back to the mirror watching your reflection closely as place the hat onto your head... as expected it sits perfectly on top and ties the whole outfit together. You just about to take it back off when you notice your hair... it's getting longer. You watch mesmerized as your short hair slowly creeps out from under the rim of the cap, just as it's reaching your shoulders it stops and then slowly starts to turn blond from the roots down to the tips. All the while you lose a couple more inches. You can't be older then 10 now.

"This is so cool..." you say in your soft tenor as you go completely blond. Next you feel a tickle in your nose. You wiggle it a bit but it just grows stronger. You can't stop yourself as you rear back and sneeze, it's big one too. You close your eyes and instinctively cover your face wit your hands.Though accompanying that is the cutest little squeak of a sneeze you've ever heard. Until you realize it's from your own throat.

You open your eyes and for a moment you think your looking at a stranger. The face was clearly a girls, with a small nose and softer features. But it was your face. You touch a few times just to make sure and it's definitely you, but you look like a little girl. In curiosity you lift up your upper lip and see a tiny pair of fangs on either side of your mouth. It clicks in place after a moment and it seems so obvious in retrospect... Your Flandre, fully save for the missing 'wings'. This costumes were not joking around. You step out of the now oversized boys socks and grab the tiny jack socks from the bench which fit your petite little feet much better. You slip on the mary janes last and turn around triumphantly. You offer a cute smile that flashes your fangs and look the picture of innocence. Though considering who your dressed as that's not entirely true.

"Well that was fun, but I should probably change ba- ahh" you lean forward on the mirror as your back begins to burn slightly. Shaking you can only watch as a pair of twisted rods slowly began to grow of of your back. It didn't hurt so much as feel hot with a slight pinching sensation but nonetheless you can't move... "Ahh!" They grow out further and further and further, their twisted shape causing you to tense and relax your muscles erratically as they move. The release of them finally stopping sends you down to your knees. As you catch your breath from the odd sensation you hear an odd jingling sound. You look up to see multi-colored crystals hanging along the twisted rods, moving awkwardly as you flex your back muscles making it sound like a wind chime.

"Pretty..." You mutter to yourself in a dazed tone before shaking the fog from your head. Looks like you found Flandre's wings. "But... if they came out of my back, how would they come back off?" you wonder, clearly concerned, though your childish new voice undermines it somewhat. You bite your lip and turn back to your clothes with the intent to changing back but pause. There's a strange yellow 'eye' sitting on top of your clothes. In fact They're all over the place actually... " What the hell?" when you reach your hand out to your clothes the eye gets closer, as if drawn to it...

12533222222222222222222122111112.content:
Immediately, you're repelled out of the costume. Black electricity crackles throughout the outfit.

"You! Are you okay boy?" The old owner asks.

"What just happened? I, I could swear I was Noel Vermillion." You stutter out frightened.

"Poor boy. These are body snatchers. Some are good, allowing the person to keep their self true and able to summon the guise and skills of another at will without eclipsing their own mind and spirit. Others, like that one, are evil, stealing bodies and enveloping their minds and spirit, essentially killing their person. I need help in ridding them from my store. Will you help me?" The old man pleads.

How do you answer.
12533222222222222222222122111112.title: Not Noel for long.

1253322222222222222222212221.content:
You come across a cream-coloured hoodie with a tail sticking out of it, along with a black face mask and matching cream shoes. The mask itself has two red eyes and a toothy grin permanently etched onto it. With a smile yourself, you recognise the attire to be a Taokaka costume. You always liked the ditsy cat vigilante and her antics in the series. You snatch the costume from its display and rush to the nearest changing room, eager to try it on.

Stripping down to your underwear and socks in the confines of the changing room, you start to pull on the costume. Because Tao's hoodie has no open sleeves, you start with her thigh-high boots. As you put on the boots, you start to feel a little tingly but just pass it off as excitement. You pull on the mask next, half expecting to be bathed in darkness. You are pleasantly surprised to see that you can actually see out of the mask. Once again, the tingling sensation is back as you fit the mask to your head. Last and certainly not least is Tao's signature hoodie. You pull up the hood before slipping your arms into the over-sized sleeves, wondering just how you're going to grip the zipper.

Without warning, the zipper to the hoodie flies up by itself, sealing you inside the costume. Freaking out a little, you turn to the wall-length mirror to see what you look like. Yep, you look like Tao, alright. Your whole body starts tingling at this point, but you ignore it as you demo the costume by posing and reciting a few of the Kaka vigilante's lines.

"Reow, you're in trouble neow!" You try to imitate Tao's voice as best you can while you pose in a faux-combat pose. "Tao's gonna be a super vigilante!"

Huh. Your constant imitation must be paying off: you sound almost just like Taokaka!

Your stomach growls at you violently, resorting to less subtle means to tell you to feed it.

"Tao's SO hungry. Tao could go for a meatbun or ten right neow!" You grumble indignantly, saddened at the lack of food around.

Wait a second. Did you just refer to yourself as Tao in the third person? Maybe it has something to do with the rapidly intensifying tingling sensation all over your body.

Growing weak-kneed, you sink to the floor as your visible features become more slender and feminine, your underwear turn into red panties, and your pecs grow and round out to become a set of sizable breasts. You feel your unmentionables fade and reform as a vagina. The blonde braids in the hoodie attach themselves to you existing hair, bleaching it the same colour and lengthening it. Your previously human ears disappear and furry cat ears find their places in the yellow ear slots of the hoodie. Finally, the tail attaches itself to your nervous system on your tailbone.

"What's happening to meow?" You mutter quietly, realizing your voice now sound exactly like Taokaka's.

Thoughts and memories the cat girl has had fill your mind, attempting to derail your own in order to replace them. As the foreign memories implant themselves, you begin to feel carefree and optimistic. Why fight it? Becoming Taokaka couldn't be THAT bad, could it?
1253322222222222222222212221.title: Nyes!

1311.content:
You were wondering what you were going to do for Joel's birthday party. It was supposed to be a costume party, but you didn't have anything that would work. Then you notice a new store, and it was a costume store! Perfect! As you walked in, it seemed to have a huge selection! Even better!

An odd little man walked up to you, "May I help you?"

You explained to him about the party, and Joel being your best friend. "I know that he was really into Stargate SG-1. I don't know a lot about it, but if you have a costume for that, it would be great. I would really like to make him happy for his birthday."

He smiled at you oddly, then said, "I have just the thing! And I can promise that you will please your friend!" He chuckled oddly, "Please follow me."

You followed him through isles and around displays. When he stopped, he flipped through what seemed to be military style coveralls. You kind-of remembered that the show included people in the Air Force, so that seemed right.

The man held up a package for you that contained a set of coveralls and a pair of military style boots. He smiled up at you, "Did you say that you were on your way to the party?" You confirmed it, "Wonderful! You may change here if you like. After you pay of course."

You looked at the package. It had the name 'Sam Carter' on it. You shrugged. You had no idea of which character was which, but you could deal with being a 'Sam'.

You paid the man, the started toward the dressing room. He confirmed your thoughts about being an odd guy as he said, "Oh, and don't worry about the missing details. The costume will have made most of the adjustments by the time you get to your freind's house. The rest will happen soon after.

You shook your head with a smile. This would be more than enough. And since the price was not bad, you didn't care about a few missing details. Putting the on the coverall was easy. It slipped right over all of your clothing. The boots fit perfectly, though they were annoying to lace up. When you were done, you were surprised at how comfortable the thing was. It seemed to fit snugly to your body, but didn't feel tight. And you were concerned that you would get too warm wearing it over your other clothes, but it was cool and comfortable. As you walked out, you held up your sneakers, "Um, could you keep these for me for tonight? I can pick them up tomorrow."

He grinned, "Of course. Though I doubt that you will want them back after tonight."

It was a few blocks to Joel's house.It was strange, but the longer you wore the costume, the better it seemed to fit, and the more comfortable it felt. As you planned, you stopped at another store on the way.to get a present for Joel. You were sure the entire world was going crazy when the girl at the checkout said, "Will that be all Ma'am?"

You sighed, "That is everything, thank you." Did your voice sound funny? Maybe you were going bonkers too. You stopped there before, and you could have sworn that girl was smaller than she seemed to you now.

At last you were at Joel's. As you reached up for the doorbell, it somehow seemed much higher. You MUST be going bonkers. Then Joel opened the door, and things got even more strange. He stood there staring at you, but you also stood there staring at him! A strange tingle went through your body as you brushed some blonde hair our of your eyes. Joel not only seemed much taller to you, but, well, he looked handsome! Even sexy! You knew you should be freaking out about feeling that way when looking at your friend, but somehow, it felt natural. Finally , you spoke first, "Um, happy birthday Joel!"

He shook his head and studied your face. Then he looked confused, "Ken?" Is that you?"

You giggled, and didn't notice how feminine it sounded, "Yes. I take it that you like my costume?"

He grinned, "I love it! How did you get yourself to look so much like Sam though?"

"The Portal gun is also known the Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device. It's hard to explain how it works. However, one can use it to get across dangerous rooms, or create a strange pit in Don Karnage's case," you answered.

"That sounds rather useful, what's the catch?" Kit asked as Baloo opened the door to building.

"The Portal device doesn't work on all surfaces," you replied you got in elevator. Kit pressed the button for you. You made a note of which floor the apartment was on.

After you got out on your floor and reached the apartment, Baloo forgot you were with him and knocked on the door. "Hello, is anybody home?" He asked.
13532221211111.title: On the way home

choices: Yes. (Baloo's going to be having a hard time getting out of this one.)
135322212111111.content: You realized that an awkward situation could come up if Rebecca was already there and she answered the door. Did she answer?
135322212111111.title: Is the real Rebecca home?

choices: Molly.  (Tells Baloo her Mommy's  been taken by pirates five minutes ago.)
135322212111112.content: You thought about what could happen depending on who opened the door. If Molly answered the door, it might be possible Don Karnage had his thugs get her thinking she was you. You could ask Baloo to help on a rescue mission to save her and use the Portal gun to do that. He might want to see the Portal gun in action. If it's the babysitter, things might be alright. As the door opened, you see...
135322212111112.title: Who's there?

choices: Take Molly with you (Safety in a group.)
Leave Kit behind to babysit. (A second chance for him.)
1353222121111121.content:
Molly answered the door and excitedly said, "Baloo, you're here! Mommy needs your help! She was kidnapped by pirates a few minutes ago. They said it was 'revenge for the double hole stunt.'"

"Calm down, Pigtails. She's fine with me. I brought her home after she escaped from the pirates. Rebecca, Molly needs you!" Baloo reassured Molly.

As you entered the apartment, a thought hit your mind, "The real Rebecca might have been here with Molly when you jumped from the roof." If that was the case, then you were responsible for her getting kidnapped. That also meant it was your responsibility to save her, plus saving her would provide you with a chance to meet her.

Molly rushes up and hugs you, then she says, "You're not my Mommy, but you're not a bad person either. I can tell by your smell and kindness. Will you help her for me?"

"Yes, but I'll need Baloo's help to get to the Iron Vulture," you answer.

"I'll help, but that's mainly because I can't stand to see Molly sad. I also want to see the Portal Gun can do for myself," Baloo offered.

Kit asked, "If you're not Miss Cunningham, who are you?"

You took a second to think. Your first name didn't sound very fitting for a lady, but your middle name (Alex) could work both ways, so replied "You may call me Alex."

"Alex, what should we do about Molly? We can't leave here alone," Baloo pointed out.

"You're right. We can't do that. I know she wants to see her mother as soon as possible, but taking her with us might not be a good idea," you said.
1353222121111121.title: Comforting Molly

choices: Rescue Rebecca with your Portal Gun.
Trick Don Karnage with the one in the blue box.
13532221211111211.content:
"As long as we stay together in a group, I guess we can all go. That means you'll have to stay with the rest of us, Molly. I want you to stay by my side at all times. If you can do that, I'll show you how to free an innocent person with a Portal Gun, and if you're lucky, I'll show you how it can be used to trick a pirate, too. Can you promise to stay beside me until we get back here and keep that promise?" you asked.

"Of course, I will stay with you if you take me with you, I promise," she said.

"Okay, now that we have that settled, let's go to Higher for Hire. I get the feeling he's after this gun. Wildcat, do you think you could create a toy version of this thing? One that doesn't actually shoot portals, but lights up in blue and orange with a flashlight that's activated by a trigger with Don Karnage's name engraved on it? We don't want him getting his hands on a real one." you said.

Wildcat answered, "Sure, I can build a fake Portal Gun like that, Alex. I'll need some supplies, though. We can pick them up on the way there." With that answer, you set out to get the parts.

Meanwhile aboard the Iron Vulture...

"Don't feign ignorance with me! I saw you with that gun that made those holes. You jumped off the roof, too. Not quite sure how you survived. Maybe you have nine lives, but they'll all be gone if I don't get that gun by tomorrow," Don Karnage demanded.

"I swear, I don't know anything about a gun like the one you're talking about. I didn't jump from a roof, either. If you don't mind, I'd like to get home to my daughter," Rebecca answered.

"You're not going anywhere until I get my hands on a white gun with a claw at the tip! Dumptruck, Mad Dog, make sure this cell door does not open until I get the gun I described!"

About an hour later at Higher for Hire...

"Okay, I made a few of these fake Portal Guns like you asked, Alex. Here's one for Molly, one for Kit, one for Baloo, one custom engraved one for Don Karnage in a blue box, one for Miss Cunningham later, and one for me. I might try to turn mine into a working one later," Wildcat said as he passed them out and put the remaining ones on the Sea Duck. Everyone gets on board the plane and Baloo takes off.

What's the plan once your on the Iron Vulture?
13532221211111211.title: Take Molly with you (Safety in a group.)

choices: You make it back to the Sea Duck. Rebecca's not angry.
135322212111112111.content:
You get out of the plane and explain, "Okay, I'm pretty confident Rebecca's being guarded. Maybe if you act like there's cake, they'll abandon their post to find it."

"Cake? That's actually pretty clever for a lie. How did you come up with that one, didn't get a cake for your birthday recently?" Baloo asked.

"Actually, it's from a..." you stopped as you realized that no one here's ever heard of "Portal" until today. If you told them the truth about it was, they wouldn't know what you meant. You decide to finish your sentence with, "book called 'Portal.'"

"That wouldn't have anything to do with the 'Portal Gun,' would it?" Kit asked.

"Yes, the Portal Device is from Portal, along with the long fall boots," you answered truthfully.

"How are the boots and Portal Gun connected?" Wildcat asked.

"The Portal Gun can be used to create an endless fall, which allows one to build up speed. That speed could be converted in high jumps and longs if another portal is placed correctly. To avoid serious injuries from those stunts, the long fall boots were made to prevent dangerous landings," you explained.

"Sounds like it would make for a great comic book series. Any chance I could read it?" Kit asked.

"Unfortunately, I don't know what I did with it. I'll try to find it if I get a chance. I do know the story pretty well. Maybe I could tell it to you later if I can't find it. Right now though, we need to focus on the task at hand," you answered.

Baloo agreed saying, "Alex is right, we need to save Beckers. Let's not waste any more time." And with that, you were off.

You ran through the corridors of the giant ship for about 10 minutes. It was lucky you had the others with you since they knew their way around. When you reached the cell block where Rebecca was being held, you stayed behind with Molly while the others distracted the guards.

"What are you doing doing here? You're not here to free the prisoner are you?" Mad Dog asked.

"No, Don Karnage invited us for cake. Thing is, he never said where on the ship it was, so we're smelling for it. Can you smell it?" Baloo asked.

"There is no cake. The boss would have told us if there," Mad Dog explained.

"Our noses disagree. We can smell it. Maybe he didn't tell you because he didn't want you to have it, but we'll share if you find it for us," Kit explained.

Dumptruck took a whiff of the air and then said, "I think I smell it too. I want some."

"Well, go get some. We'll stand guard while you find it," Baloo offered. With that offer, the two pirates ran off searching for the cake, which allowed you all to sneak into the cell block. You waited with Molly and fired an orange portal at the wall next to the door as you prepared for your next move.

"Baloo, you're here. Did Molly send you? Is she okay? Did you get the key from the guards?" Rebecca asked as she was happy to see her pilot.

"Molly asked us to come and get you. We couldn't leave her behind, but we couldn't decide who should watch either. We decided on a 'safety in numbers' strategy and brought her with us. We didn't get the key, but we have someone who claims to have another way of getting you out of there. As for where the guards are now, we sent them on a wild goose chase for cake," Baloo answered.

"What can you me about the person who can help me out of here? I get the feeling the door's been rigged to an alarm, so you'd need someone really strong or someone good at disabling alarms," Rebecca asked with concern.

"Her name is Alex. I'm not sure she's strong or good at disabling alarms, but she did survive a seven story fall earlier today. She looks a lot like you, but her personality seems much calmer," Baloo answered.

"Anything else you would like to tell me?" Rebecca asked with suspicion.

"Well, she did have Wildcat create some toys for the kids. She even planned on making one for Don Karnage as a backup plan if things went wrong. She even had him make one for you as a bit of an apology gift," Baloo said as showed her the device.

Rebecca saw the device and started thinking, "A white gun with a claw. This must be what Don Karnage wanted. Obviously it was Alex who he was after." She then asked Baloo, "May I see Alex? I want to talk with her." Just as Baloo open his mouth, you and Molly walk towards her cell. She starts to get angry and shouts, "YOU! You're the one who got me in this mess! If you hadn't..."

Molly interrupts her mother in hopes of calming her down, "Mommy, Alex came here to help you."

"I want to help you, but you need to calm down. Your rant will just increase the odds of us getting caught. If you're still feeling angry after we get out of here, we can talk it out like adults. Until then, just try to calm down," you explained.

"Speaking of 'getting out of here', how do you plan to get this cell open? Wait, you're not planning to blow a hole in the wall, are you?" she asked with concern.

You point the Portal Device at the wall behind her and say, "Something like that, yes." She starts to worry as you fire a blue Portal at the wall. After a few seconds, she starts to wonder if something went wrong and asks, "How did that help? It didn't do anything."

You reply, "Try looking behind you."

She turns around and notices the portal on the wall. "What is that? Where did that come from? Where does it go? I guess it's my way out," she asked as she entered the portal. "Hey, over here!" she shouts near the door.

"Rebecca, how did you get over there?" Baloo asked as all of you ran towards her.

"That's what the Portal Device does. It can create two linked holes on surfaces, but it doesn't work on all surfaces," you explain briefly.

"Did you make it yourself, or do you just know how to work it?" Baloo asked.

"I didn't make. It was a gift. I just know how to operate it. Anyway, I think we should get going," you replied. And with that all of you left the room.
135322212111112111.title: A lie to get rid of guards: Cake.

choices: Rebecca wants to know more about your world.
You, her, and Molly sit down for dinner together.
1353222121111121112.content:
Not long after you left the room, you heard Don Karnage over the intercom biting Dumptruck and Mad Dog's heads off. He must have planned to make an announcement and forgot to shut it off. "I don't know how you found out about the cake I got for when I got that device that makes those holes, nor do I care. I want to know what makes you think you DESERVE IT! Especially since you abandoned YOUR POST! You're also telling me the prisoner is unguarded, yes-no?" he shouted with anger. You thought this was funny.

The response they gave added to the humor, "Der, these two bears told us you invited them here for cake and offered to give us some if managed to find it. They offered to watch the prisoner for us if we did," Dumptruck replied.

"So many lies. I can't believe you idiots FELL FOR THEM! Why would I invite those two bears for CAKE?! THEY'RE OUR ENEMIES! NOW GET BACK TO THE PRISONER BEFORE THEY SET HER FREE!" Don Karnage screamed as he was about blow his top. You were trying really hard not to laugh.

Baloo noticed this and asked "What's so funny, Alex?"

You reply, "I'll try to explain later if you still want to know, let's get out of here first."

"I don't want your laughing to cause us more trouble. I'm going to carry you the rest of the way since it's not much farther," Baloo says as he picks you up and carries you.

Later on in Baloo's plane, you've managed to settle down a bit. You all were on the way back to Cape Suzette. You reset the device so there was no active portals and put the glasses back into the compartment. Rebecca was curious about everything that just happened. Baloo gave her the toy Wildcat made for her. As she looked at it, she thought about what happened and how it would make a great story. However, she wants to know more about the story behind it, so she starts asking questions. She starts with, "Okay, I think know what the Portal device does now, but what about the glasses and the boots?"

You reply, "Not every surface can sustain a portal. The glasses are designed to help determine which ones will work. As for the boots, one safety issue is brought up when the device is used to create a continuous fall. In those cases, a falling object will continue to fall at faster speed. The boots serve as a safety measure to allow people to survive those kinds of falls. I was going to let Wildcat examine them so he could make a pair for himself," you answered.

"Where did you get Portal gun? Who made it?" she asked next.

"I get the feeling it might be Buzz," Baloo answered.

"Actually, the device was made by a company known as Aperture, but it does not exist my reality, yet," you answer.

"Wait, are you saying your from another reality or the future?" Kit asked.

"Judging by the way the gun and boots look, I'd say Alex isn't from the Cape Suzette we know," Rebecca answers.

"Indeed, I'm not. I'm from a different reality and about 70 years from the future compared to yours," you answer.

"I get the feeling you don't have any place to stay. If you want, I could let you stay with me. As long you don't try anything funny and stay on my good side, I'll let you stay with me. My bed's got extra room for my space-bending rescuer," Rebecca offers.

"Thanks. I really appreciate your kindness," you answer.

"It's the least I could do to thank you for saving me, Alex," she answers.

Later on at Rebecca's apartment...
1353222121111121112.title: The uninterrupted escape

Take it off right now, you'll put it on when you leave

You look out, and the sun is still out. So in the show she has the power, but not in reality.

"Oh well," You say, "I guess I could sleep this way, and be stuck like this forever, gosh who knows what will happen then," you say, but you do like this body a bit more than your old one.

"Goodnight mother!" You call out to her, who was reading a book in the living room.

"Ok sweetie!" She responds from downstairs, "brush your teeth!" She adds. You roll your eyes, and comply to your mom's orders. After an ordeal where you finally get your powers of levitation right, you crawl into bed, and pull the covers over yourself, not wanting your mom to see you sleeping in your soon to be body. Where do you wake up?
