As you watched, Sleeping Beauty and Marvin (from the Hitchhikers Guide to the Galaxy) came down the stairs, Marvin carrying his head, while Sleeping Beauty's wig was lopsided. And in a corner, looking around, was your girlfriend Diana, dressed as Princess Peach from Mario.
You think it is time to present yourself in your great costume to her, maybe she also will not recognize you at once…
15133222222222222212221.title: Yes?

152.content:
You parouse around to the next aisle, which reads "Sci-Fi/Horror Costumes". Smirking, you admire the extremely hokey Dracula, Wolf Man, and other such costumes... Something in you feels like this is the right choice, but then again, it could not be... It's up to you.

Do you want to look like something out of a B-Movie? Or is the Blob too flabby for you?
152.title: The 50s Called, They Want Their Cheap Horror Back.

1521.content: The question is, which costume suits you?
1521.title: Choose Dracula/Wolf Man/Frankenstein's Monster

15211.content:
You take a liking to the vampiric selection of this campy aisle, and browse the racks of faux fangs, greasy hair, and super high collar. However, there is another option that you've seen, that is a bit more risky... It appears to be a misplaced one.

The label reads "Vampyre", and you can't distinguish the rest; the costume does have a nice sheen to it.

You're deciding between trying on the super cheesy costume, or the really incredible, but mysterious "Vampyre" costume... Odds are you're going to be the best dressed at the party anyways.

So, what'll it be? The Bela Lugosi, or the Vlad the Impaler era costume?
15211.title: A Costume with Bite

152112.content:
You're pretty lucky your friend is into horror stuff, or else this type of costume wouldn't fly. The clerk comes out of nowhere, and asks you, "Need any assistance?"

You're kind of confused, but regardless you mention something about looking for the fitting rooms. After all, what use is a costume that doens't fit you?

The clerk smiles, with a very austere grin, saying, "Oh, the fitting rooms are in back. You might need a bit of help with this one..."

"Oh, no, I'm fine," you say.

"No, I insist. This costume's a hassle if you don't know how to... wear it."

The glint of this guy's smile is really starting to freak you out. But, the hopeless person inside of you doesn't listen, and walks off towards the fitting rooms.

While thinking about that really strange guy, you pull the costume's main piece over your head. Ironically, it fits you quite well. It must have been sheer luck that you managed to find the perfect size. As you're trying on this costume, you wonder if you friend's dad, the special effects guy, might hook you up with some fake blood, just to pull a really good prank on his birthday. And then, your thoughts slowly progress as you wonder, what if it was real blood?

These thoughts increase, until you realize you're slowing dreaming of attacking people at the party, drinking them dry...

But you're not a vampire... Are you?

You finally realize you've finished putting on the costume (is it a costume?) and look up in the mirror.

What you see doesn't look anything like the old you, but it sure doesn't look like a costume. You feel the fangs (did you put in the fangs?) in your mouth, and start to gaze more...

Your skin is paler than a ghost, and your eyes have lost their color to dark blackness. Your hair, once short and human, is now long, gangly, black. You have grown a few inches, too. And that costume makes you look older, by at least a few years. But you know, it's more like decades...

What's happening to you?
152112.title: Check Out on Aisle Creepy

choices: Try and get the costume off
1521121.content:
You're tempted to run out of the stall, and holler out that creeper clerk, but somehow, you're doubting that you're even in a costume store anymore... And that salivating grin spreading across your face at the thought of a bloody scene is really frightening. You need to act fast.

Do you run out of the store, or do you stick around and try to get the costume off?

If you don't hurry, the costume's brain might take over...
1521121.title: Continue...

15211211.content:
Running out of the store, you feel thirsty. REALLY thirsty. You stop in a convience store to buy something to drink. After buying water, milk, pop and just about every drink known to man...you're still thirsty.

The store owner says, "Son, I think you have a drinking problem." You lick your lips, looking at his juicy, delicious neck.

You're tempting to dig in and enjoy a gallon of blood, but you decide to leave just in case. Unfortunatley, a bunch of teenagers come and block the doorway. They're laughing and smiling. Their blood would be just divine...


Knowing you can't control the bloodlust anymore, you pick your target and sink your teeth in.


Who did you choose?
15211211.title: Run out of the store

15212.content:
Your friend always jokes about how he's such an beast; how funny would it be to crash his party as one?

The hairier, the better, in your case, as you scan the rack for a suitable costume. You find the appropriate size, and you almost yell out an appreciatory howl because you're so happy!

The clerk, who's been eyeing you from behind the counter, saunters towards you, sighs, and groans, "How can I help you?"

You think to yourself, "What a strange guy..."

To the clerk, you merely ask where the fitting room is. He gives a slight moan, and gestures towards the back corner. As you walk away from him, you notice him pushing up his falling glasses with a chuckle. He struck you as a very average person, but that last act was just plain odd.

Making it into the room, you pull out the very ragged costume. There wasn't a label on this one, only a sticker marked "Clearance". You barely look at the small print under the corner's warning "CAUTION". Maybe you should have.

The clothes slide on like a glove, and you mischieviously smile at the thought of the party.

Suddenly, a chime comes out from the store's intercom, and it announces the store closing in 15 minutes, at 9:00. Funny, it hadn't been that late when you walked into the store...

A strange realization hits you, Mom's waiting. You and your mother had taken it upon yourselves to view the moon tonight, because it was at its closest and fullest tonight. Both of you were extremely into astronomy.

You catch a glance at yourself, and suddenly you turn and start to stare frightened at yourself. The changes are coming far too fast...
15212.title: Howl Like A Dog, Or Wolf

152121.content:
Your hair is pushing out of your scalp faster than you can brush it out. You look like some sort of deranged hippie, straight from a nuke protest. You're growing stronger, and taller, and kind of resemble your older brother, who's at least in his twenties. The costume, which was loose on your limber figure, is now threatening to rip apart like the Incredible Hulk's, and your face is growing very indistinguishable. The sprouting of a tail is enough to confirm you're definitely the Wolf Man.

The fear is closing in on you, but so is your animal instinct. The store is going to close in 5 minutes. You need to think fast.

Do you try to huff it out of the store, and hope to high heaven this is all a creepy dream?

Or, do you stick around until closing, and see if that sulky clerk has anything to say.

Every second that ticks away, you're losing more and more of your human rationale. Any time wasted, and you might give in to the beast...
152121.title: Teen Wolf, Only Real

1521212.content:
You pounce around the corner to look for that sleazy creep, but quickly duck behind the wall when you hear a horrific beating going on. You peek around again, and discover the nice-looking old man from before dishing out that punishment. He's a lot stronger than he looks, and creepier. For some reason, he looks younger than he did before, and that clerk doesn't look as sloppy... What's going on here?

You decide to listen in on their conversation...

"You let the kid pick that costume? Are you insane? It's unstable! You've just dished out a very valuable 'costume'!"

"What's so important about the stuffs, anyways? It only takes a few thousand years to make a new one..."

The clerk shrugged, and shivers coursed through your spine. What kind of people were these? A few thousand years? The old man slapped the clerk again, and raised his voice.

"A few thousand years, which we could spend gathering the energy!"

"This store closes up every decade and relocates, of its own vocation. You'd think we could at least speed up the 'ma--"

"Sssshh!"

The old man cut off the clerk, and suspiciously peered around the room. You shuffle back behind the wall of safety as quickly as possible, praying he wasn't looking for you.

"You should watch your tongue. Our enemies are as vigilant as we. Needless to say, we need that boy to keep it on, the costume. That's the only way this is going to work."

You shudder again, sinking in deeper and deeper fear. They wanted you to keep it on! And something about them really freaked you out, more than the norm. One thing was for sure, you'd definitely stumbled into something a lot bigger than costume shopping for a party...

How could you even think of the party now?

Eyeing the door, and noticing the keys in the manager's hand, you gather up the courage to make a break for it. Your costume has enhanced your agility quite a bit, so you're goading in the idea that you've outmatched them.

Unfortunately, you didn't expect the old man to have inhuman speed, either. He blocks off the door, and the clerk is menacingly carrying an unidentifiable weapon...

What do you do? Try and fight them with your new ablities, or look for an escape, screw the creepers, and get this frightening costume off?
1521212.title: Creepers Stick Together... Even in Plotting.

15212122.content:
You make it out safe, now you are confused. How is this going to affect your family, friends. and yourself? You're going downtown to find a hiding spot to think this through.
What should you do ? Go to your friend's house, Chris and get help, or accept your new life as the wolfman?
15212122.title: The choice is yours.

152121221.content:
You go to Chris's house. With your new wolf strength you jump up to his bedroom window. You open it forcfully but queitly. You go inside and Chris is sleeping.
You wake him up like thers's no tomorow, he falls of the bed and makes a loud bang noise, you can only hope his parents are not home. You aprouach Chris in your new body and he gets all excited and scared at the same time. You explain to him what has happened. Chris says that you can stay in his house inside his room or you can turn him into a wolf as well and you both can have the same life.
152121221.title: A risky decision.

1521212211.content:
"Go ahead and bite me then." said Chris.
You go on ahead and bite him, he howls in pain. Chris started to sweat and get hotter, he starts getting undressed starting with his socks, shirt, then pants.
Chris's blond hair starts to grow rapidly, his toe and finger nails start to grow and get sharper, moments later he has long powerefull claws that replaced his useless human nails.
He starts to get more bigger and stronger, his muscle growth rapidly increases. His fangs start to grow and his arms and legs start to get more hairy.
He drops on all fours and when he dropped on all fours his hands became more wolf like. His arms are now completely covered in fur, and his feet grow hair as well. His back is covered in hair.
And he howls in pain just as his snout extends. his ears get longer and are wolf like now.
Chris's transformation was complete. Now you and Chris are both wolfs. You are glad that you will not have to go through this alone. Chris looked at himself in his mirror and said "I look good with a six pack." You both were fooling around and were flexing in front of the mirror.
"So, what do we do now?" asked Chris.
"I guess we could go to the old construction site down the road." you replied.
"But first I need to get some shorts." said Chris.
"And why do we need shorts?" you replied.
"Because I'm not comfortable walking around like this." said Chris.
He hands you a gray cargo short.
"Now we are ready to go." said Chris.
"What about a shirt?" you said
"If anyone does sees us I want to look good." Chris said happily.
Do you go to the construction site, or stay in his house and have his parents accept both of you as you are.
1521212211.title: The change.

choices: $20 dollars is expensive but a resonable price considering the detailing
Free, as if worn permanently, like becoming then a real pony, How?
15221.content:
"Pony Mike"

Pulling the costume from off the rack, it is a marvel of supreme details not expected, but seemingly all there to make its wearer look like a pretty pony, or in this costume a Shetland pony. The costume is something of a personal fun fantasy, having know a man who bred ponies and one of them you knew as Mike, a dappled gray and black coloration exactly like the costume.

The feel of the fur is exactly the same as was the many times touching and petting of pony Mike.

The costume is a full body covering as if made for the wearer to stand upright, as somehow able to walk on stylish hoofs, as having a tail, mane, ears and a mask head that needs inspection, it being perfect, looks like a real pony head.

"How much is the renting of this one," you asked the shop clerk, as holding up high the costume in the air.

"Twenty dollars per day, or free if you would wish to wear it permanently!" comes then an unexpected reply, one what requires some further interesting questions.
15221.title: a creature

152211.content:
"Huh, what kind of pricing is that, one day for twenty and if keep it permanently its for free?"

"Yea vo, that is the way I work it," replied the shopkeeper.

"I could get the twenty by tomorrow, I would wish to try it on here first if you do not mind?"

"One size fits all, it can stretch or implode, but fits skin snug, the use of Reformation Salve before donning on the costume makes it then the new as permanent you, you being then a Shetland pony. So I make money renting it and or selling you after you become an animal, I win no matter what you decide."

There is a long span of time when the silence continued as an unbroken wall between the shopkeeper and his customer. As nice as the costume feels and the delight of wearing it fulfilling a personal fantasy, the reasoning the old man say about the costume suggests he is a wizard or plum crazy.

"Thanks, I may come back tomorrow," was the reply, As carefully hanging the fur suit back on the costume rack before turning around and walking out the shop front door, a look back at the shop and the old man inside, one can see him checking the pony costume for any damages or maybe for some other, rather diabolical plan for the next customer wishing to be like a pony for a day.
152211.title: $20 dollars is expensive but a resonable price ...

choices: The old man does not give up easily
1522111.content:
Walk to the bus stop and the thirty minute ride home, as entering the house there stood mom, her face a scowl and she looking like you did something plainly terrible.

"What, is something wrong?" It was asked, as Mom stood there with her long wooden spoon in hand, the same thing she had used many a time to inflict properly needed punishments.

"I thought you loved us, your father and me, but after taking a phone call from a costume shop about you wanting to rent a furry suit to travel and see the country while wearing it, you make me angry!" Mom said, she believing a man she never met, taking his word about her own son, and ready to do what it take to make her sonny come to his senses.

"It was not that at all, I was walking home from after school sports meet when I saw this odd as small shop, its signs boasting of having everything from soup to nuts. I had time so I thought to take a look-see inside.

The signs was correct, the old man clerk and the shop had all sorts of neat things, gifts for every occasion, and costumes for parties, very real looking wear, I looked at the stuff and excused myself before leaving, as made no plans but to come home and have supper!"

Mom said nothing more and as she went to preparing supper for dad, her and me, I went upstairs to my bedroom where I found the computer blinking I had an e-mail.

Checking the incoming e-mail, it was from the shop and the old man clerk. He somehow found my e-mail and sent an offer for my returning that same night to his shop for a private fitting of the pony costume.

Maybe the old man thought we lived close by, but taking the city bus there if it kept me past nine o-clock, the buses stop running and I would need walk home the five miles or more. On that basis I thought it best to stay at home and ignore, not answer the e-mail as to validate that I received the message.

A quick hand washing and hearing mom call "Dinner Time, " I went to eat with my loving parents.
1522111.title: The surprise at home

choices: One long as restless weird night
15221112.content:
Ring-ring...

"I got it, hello..." I said as I answered the phone.

"Hey Bud, what the heck did you sign me up for some costume fitting for tomorrow after school, and I never heard of the shop, where is it?" Tyler asked, he a buddy from school, lived three houses away from our home.

"I did no such thing, though I saw as stopped by this funny small shop downtown and the man running the store wanted in the worst way to have me come back tonight yet and get a private fitting of one of his very realistic costumes.

I made no mention of you or anybody, and i did not give him my e-mail address, but he just sent me an e-mail!" I told Tyler, as my friend listened, he said with a tone of surprise, "Hey, I just got an e-mail from that shop, asking me to stop there for a dual fitting, you and me for our Shetland pony team costumes!"

Bing.... The sound then of both out computers getting an e-mail at the same time.

"Hey will you look at this," I said to Tyler, as he said about the say to me, we getting an authorized dismissal day from school at the request and authorization of the school principle, as we were help advertise a new shop downtown, the request coming from the downtown business owners society.

"I guess we have no good reason not to go for that personal fitting, but what is it about you and me dressing up like Shetland ponies and being a team?" Tyler asked, as only silence meant we neither knew the reasons why, or how this all came about!
15221112.title: A friend calls...

choices: A good morning greeting like none I wish to hear again
152211121.content:
"Never, in such a short duration of life had I thought about leaving home, as forever!" Lying there in bed, the questions my mind posed, the question posed by Tyler, he was my best friend, how then did that old man at the shop know as was able to do, he wanted us or me, but why?

Come the morning and I got up out of bed as dressed like I was going to school, not wanting mother to know or worry about me going with Tyler to the shop, as both of us rejecting that personal fitting.

Breakfast time was as a ware concealed, Mom was very quiet, rather sullen as she scrabbled the pan fun of eggs and made some raisin toast. We ate in silence, her anger of me still present, and I felt it!

When I was walking out of the house to walk then to the bus stop, Mom said, "You think today about your home and remember that I love you please."

Me hearing her say that to me almost made me want to fall to my knees and beg her to help as keep me home and away from that foolish shop of costume horror. Yet I stuck to my plan of going and asking that old man how he arranged what he did, taking in as well Tyler, as though he wished to become a part of my fantasy.

Tyler met me as I was walking and together we met then the city bus, ignoring the school bus, and rode then to downtown, talking, as i was planning what I should say.

The city bus dropped us off a block away from the shop and we walked together, Tyler muttering his worries of how I got him to come along. As we arrived to the front door of the shop the sign in the window read as "Closed." A second sign posted just inside as setting on the floor read as "Early fitting appointments available, go to the alley side door and ring the bell."

I noted the alternative sign, pointing it out to Tyler, seeing him, his facial expression as one of more than worry, like he was scared. None-the-less, we walked to the alley and along its darkness to a steel door surrounded in a morning haze of expelled steam coming from vent pipes there in the alley.

I pressed the button to ring the doorbell, and heard what sounded like a old style phone ringing then inside the building. A moment later and the side door opened but the person greeting us was not the shopkeeper, but a woman, the dressed in a skin-tight Zebra costume. She stood there and then smiled, her teeth looking like those of a real equine, white, squared, a front row top and bottom with the gap where might go a bit attached to a bridle. We gawking at her, saw there the essence of a woman but standing precariously on the hind like legs of a zebra, having black hoofs, a swishing tail, and lots of stripes.

"Please enter, and I suspect you are Tyler and his good friend here for your personal fittings of the pony team!" She said, as I was a bit surprised she could speak so well considering her lips and mouth was quite equine of form.

We entered past the door, walking as would men going to their expected deaths and followed by some manner of perdition. Walking then along a narrow hallway between rows of hung furry and or hairy costumes. As finally we entered what was the costume shop sales floor, and saw there the old man standing, he holding a pony costume in each hand while smiling with a devilish grin.
152211121.title: One long as restless weird night

choices: Costume in hand, and wishing I never got out of bed
1522111211.content:
"A good morning to the both of you, I was expecting you to come later in the morning, but by coming so early, I rather suspect you are of agreement then for wanting to wear each his costume on a permanent basis!" The old man said, as she his zebra associate there then giggles a shrill sort of braying sound.

"Please then come and take your costume, you will note they are identical, as if you were born of the same union of stallion and a mare. The fur colors are a dappled gray/black across the back to rump, with heather colored mane and tail, all black from the cannon bone to fore hoofs, as from the hind hocks to the hind hoofs. The skin/hide color is black, as well you may not it is dense as heavy when suiting it on you, the weight is superficial only when donning the costume, as after two hours it should feel quite natural and comforting." The shopkeeper said, as I stepped forward and looked him in the eyes.

"If you please, we have some questions as how and why you drew us to come here this morning. When yesterday I entered your shop and we talked, I said nothing about my friend Tyler, nor did I suggest he wanted what I was of interest to enjoy if only for an overnight renting." I said, as the old man handed me a clothes hanger holding one costume, as Tyler, looking like he were in a trance stepped up and took then his costume.

I turned to look at Tyler, seeing his face as dull of expressions, his eyes wide and not blinking, he looked like a zombie!

"Hey, what did you do to Tyler...," I said as speaking the name of my friend, I too felt a hood of deeming power take control of me. I wanted to ask more but stood as watched the zebra lady escort Tyler to a dressing room, she entering it behind him, as smiled at me when she closed the dressing room door.

I stood there totally immobile, powerless to move or talk, as waiting, the shopkeeper there too, was waiting for Tyler to come out and model for me his new pony self.

The accounting to time we waited came by way of Tyler moaning several times, until hearing him cry a shrill pony like whinny before then the dressing room door swung open.

The zebra woman walked out from the dressing room, she holing a lead rein attached to a head halter strapped around the new face of my friend Tyler.

Walking then as on all fours, he, Tyler looked as if born to being a pony. His head bobbed as he strode each stepping forward, his tail swung with every step taken, he acted as if a passive mindset to his being exactly like a real born pony.

That woman led then Tyler to an open area where she led him to walk in a circle giving me the thoughts of what it would be like when I was to join my friend in being a pony animal. I fell to kneeling as she jerked the rein and Tyler stopped as stood there looking directly at me. I saw his lower lip quivering, his dark eyes, and and ears laid back suggesting to me he was terrified.

"Is he modeling what the costume looks like, or did she use the salve to make this as his new, real self?" I asked the shopkeeper, only to see him then smile and nod his head to affirm that friend Tyler was then a boy being a pony, as in time learning to act as would a brute animal.

"Tyler I am sorry," I said, as my friend stretched his neck to press his long pony face to my chest and cried a sad sounding whinny.

"So what then of Tyler," I asked boldly?

"Tyler, along with his brother pony shall be trucked from here later today to a farm some twenty miles away. As once arrived there to the farm the two of you shall be placed in a stall and daily given training for working in a harness as a pony team to draw a wagon. Your ultimate use is for a coming sale to where you shall live as ponies, being part of an act in a circus. The circus is owned by a dear friend, she of Italian heritage, her name being Kirke! As you will find Kirke to be a heartless woman demanding much from her animals as she delights from knowing that what I sent to her were all previous of being animal were human born.

Your being a boy and soon a pony shall gift you some wild as wonderful experiences, of what some came asking and gained a new lifestyle feeling strong and masculine every day they were alive.

In time as with the learning to be as act like ponies and animals, the commonality friendship you had with Tyler will be as jealous beasts knowing little more than hunger and attune to your being alive. This was what you originally entered my shop with the thought as fantasy for becoming, if for a overnight thrill, as this thrill is something ongoing and for a lifetime.

Ah too, the being born a human, as part of that godly gifted gracing, you being a pony changes nothing of the biblical account of a normal human lifetime being of three score and ten year. A score is as twenty years, and with being transformed the number to your years returns to A-number one. So you may expect as the least your lifetime being a pony as living the some seventy years, or maybe longer.

When then you arrive and become part of the circus animals, seek out Jonas, he has lived for more than a hundred good years being a white Percheron horse, what Kirke rides into the ring to announce each coming attraction. Jonas was a dear friend so long ago, and has, after being gelded, become at ease with life, he a horse for some two hundred plus odd years. Consider Jonas as a role model and if you find life of a pony as satisfying, do as he did and live a long life feeling your fantasy thrills."

As nice as the costume felt and the delight of wearing it fulfilling a personal fantasy, the reasoning the old man said about the costume suggests he is either a wizard or plum crazy.

1523.title: Keep looking...

15231.content:
You walk up to the baby section of the store. You look around and see a big package that says "baby boy" on it. It's a big blue footed sleeper.

"That's weird," you say to yourself "but hey, I bet the guy's will get a kick out of this! So you quickly grab the package, a little embaressed, and run to the nearest changing room.

When you get to the room you open the bag and dump it's contents on th bench next to you. When you see what's inside your amazed, it's filled with much more than you thought. There was a sleeper, a pacifier, a baby bottle, bib, and even a diapercomplete with changing supplies, all big enough to fit someone your age.

When you sort through these things your awe-struck, you thought it was just a sleeper. "I don't really know about this," you say to yourself "but then again, what could happen?

You start getting dressed, but then you look at the diaper. "maybe I should forget the diaper...nah" you said shaking your head " if I'm gonna do this I'm gonna do this right, like ma dad always said."

You stip down naked and start putting on the over sized pampers desposible diaper. "Funny I don't remember them having pampers I'm such a big size." you sit down on the diaper, hearing it's rickl"e as you sit, and feel it's soft and warmness. You quickly apply powder and bring it up between your legs. Feeling softer than ever you start putting the sleeper on. After a while of tring to figure it out you get it on. You put your pacifier en your mouth and stand up to get a good look in the mirror at yourself.

You pull the huge costume off the rack and take it to the change rooms. You lock the door behind you, then start pulling on the outfit.

You pull the clothes on anyway, and they hang loosely off your thin frame. You have to tighten the pants to hold them up, though. You pull on the gloves, then look in the mirror. You look ridiculous! The costume's far too big for you - why'd you even put it on in the first place? You sigh, then go to take off the singlet when an intensely warm sensation wells in your stomach. Almost instantly, you start growing heavier. Your bones thicken and stretch painfully, and you grow several inches taller. Your hair turns blond, and a tattoo appears on your arm. Your muscles begin to grow as well, and you watch in shock as your biceps inflate with bulging muscles before your eyes. Your chest expands outwards, and your flat stomach develops a rock-hard six pack, while your legs grow stronger too. Your ripped body pulses with raw strength, and it feels amazing, but you can't shake the feeling that something's off. Wasn't the blob supposed to be fat?

As soon as the thought registers, you start growing again. Only this time, you're packing on fat, not muscle. Your chiseled abs are quickly swamped by a swelling gut, while your pecs inflate into huge man-boobs. Your arms and legs are invaded in thick layers of flab, and the previously ripped muscles transform into jiggling sausages of blubber. Your rock-hard jaw sags and turns into a double chin, then a triple chin as it engulfs your neck, forming a thick flap of fat around your face. Your gut and breasts are soon pressed tight against the fabric of the singlet, but just when it's about to tear, you stop growing.

You look down at yourself in shock. You're huge! Was the Blob always THIS fat? You barely fit into the stall!

You somehow manage to unlock the door, and step out of the stall with a bit of difficulty. What now?

“Hey!! Git back here! Ya’ll can’t just leave me like this!” You pound on the door, belly wobbling under your straining shirt as you do so, before realizing he’s not coming back. Not for now anyway. Sighing, you run a finger through your hair, only to realize it’s thinning a bit now, and that you have a slightly fuzzier face. “Gawd, this can’t be real.” You mutter, walking away.

You look like a fatter, unwashed and slightly older version of yourself, and according to the man, this was permanent. ‘It couldn’t be, right?’ you hope. You’re still hoping this is just a bad dream and that you’ll wake up tomorrow your same old self. Exhausted, you dejectedly walk away from the shop, not really knowing where to go or who can help you. You don’t think your family would recognize you. Maybe your old best friend, Mark, would? You’ve been close since childhood.

For some reason, he’s the first person to pop into your mind. Maybe he could help, somehow? You decide just to hurry on over to his house and hope for the best. 15233212212221.content:
You were absolutely famished! You didn’t understand why or how, but you wanted to eat, and eat, and eat. You also want to be catered to too. After all, can a man of your size really be expected to cook anything?

You pick up the phone and dial your favorite pizza joint. It’s hard to press the buttons on the phone with your fat fingers, but you manage to do it and get a man on the phone.

“Hello, welcome to Marco’s, can I take your order?” He asks in a sort of monotonous voice.

“Yes, I’d like 12 dozen pizzas please.” You say in your deeper, sexier, Blob-ier voice.

“Alright, a-a dozen pizzas…” He seems a bit surprised, “That’ll be—“

“No, not ONE dozen pizzas, TWELVE dozen.” You repeat yourself, licking your lips as you think of how delicious they’ll be.

“T-Twelve dozen…?” He sounds lost for words, “But, sir, that’ll be…”

“144 pizzas. I know. I’m just REALLY hungry.” You move the phone down to your gut, letting the man hear your gurgling gut.

“….A-Alright… These aren’t refundable you know?” You nod as he rings it up. You don’t care! You just wish he’d go ahead and hurry up. “That’ll be… $720.00?!”

Money is no object when you’re this peckish. You agree to the cost as the man sounds like he’s about to fall over thinking about it. “Alright –sir… It’ll be ready in a-a few minutes…” You pout about having to wait for food. Still, if it’s worth what you paid for it, you don’t care.

After hanging up on the man, you go to the kitchen to prepare a ‘small snack’ out of almost everything in your fridge to help tied you over. It hardly helps. All you want is pizza!

Finally, after far too long, the doorbell rings. You run over to it, massive footsteps shaking your house and causing pictures to fall off the walls and furniture to fall over like a small earthquake. Opening the door, you see the deliveryman with several pizza boxes stacked high.

“I-Is this the right address…?” He asked, unable to see behind the tower of pizzas. “It is.” You reply as you greedily take the boxes from him, rip open the first one, and start chowing down. He stares at you, “A-Are you… Fred Dukes?” You cock an eyebrow and give him a sly smile, “Maybe.”

The deliveryman stands there in awe as he looks up at the huge figure in front of him. It makes you feel powerful. “Is this all the pizzas?” You ask. The man shakes his head. “N-No sir… T-There’s more in the car…”

“Well, go get them and bring them in then…” after effortlessly finishing your slice, you wipe your greasy hand on your singlet as you stand aside to let the man into your house behind your massive belly. “I’m very hungry…” You grin at the amazed man.

Walking over to the couch with the pizza boxes in your arms, you finish off slice after slice, before eventually the whole box is gone. You let out a big BUUUUURRRP before tossing the empty box aside and starting on the next. The man hasn’t even made it in with all your pizzas yet, and you’ve already finished a whole box and started on another one. “Damn! How fast can you eat?” He wonders. You shrug, “This is kinda new for me”. You’re already halfway done with your second box.

He brings the rest of them inside, with great difficulty, as you polish off box after box. As he carries in the last of the 144 boxes, you take them off his hands, having finished the ones he had initially handed you, and start going to town on them. The deliveryman can’t stop staring. “You like to eat, huh?” You’re about to answere, before you hear a creaking noice. Suddenly, the couch you’re sitting on snaps in half and drops you to the floor. You laugh loudly, “I guess you could say that! Haha!”

The man is completely transfixed on you. You know he should’ve already left by now, but, noticing his stare, and the bulge in his pants, you smile. “Like what you see?” He blushes as you notice him. “Don’t worry, it’s natural when confronted with a man like me! You can sit with me if you want.” You finish off another box, and let out another belch, “I’d like the company.” The deliveryman gulps as he walks over and sits beside you on the destroyed couch.

“You can sit on my knee if that’s more comfortable.” He shakes his head, “No, this is… fine…” He rests against your fat belly as you continue to eat, and eat, and eat from the pile of pizzas beside you.
15233212212221.title: Feast for a Blob.

15233212221.content:
As you walk through the aisles, a rather large king outfit catches your eye. You pull it off the rack and head to the change rooms, then start pulling it on. The costume consists of a pair of breeches, some shoes, a leather vest, a cape, and a crown. The fabric is surprisingly comfortable and silky - kind of like the stuff an actual king would wear. Sadly, it's all several sizes too large for you, and you look ridiculous. You pick up the label that came with the costume, which shows a fat, bearded man dressed in the same clothes you are in currently. Beneath him are the words "One size fits all!" - yeah right.

You sigh, then move to take off the cape when you realise that the costume has gotten tighter. Odd, you don't remember tightening anything; maybe the outfit's shrinking? You look down, and discover that the costume's not shrinking - you're growing! Your flat stomach is bulging outwards, and your pecs are following suit - within seconds, the vest is stretched tight around your generous gut and breasts. Your arms and legs swell, and layer upon layer of thick blubber begins to fill in the costume. As you grow fatter, a thick beard sprouts over your (now double) chin. You grasp at your growing body, and try to take off the outfit, but your swelling fingers make it nigh impossible to undo the buckles and clasps. Not that it matters, anyway - they're about to break anyway, since your swelling body has stretched them to their limit. But, just as the buckle around your swollen paunch seems ready to burst, you stop growing.

Dear god, the costume's tight - nearly every buckle and strap is digging into your skin in some way. At least now that you've stopped growing, you can loosen a few of them - you undo the clasp on the belt, and your stomach explodes outward. The rest of the buckles also loosen, for some reason, and the pressure around your body lessens; you end up sagging outwards a few more inches in the process. Time to see what you look like - you turn to the mirror.

A fat, bearded man looks back at you through the glass. He seems oddly familiar... Of course - the picture on the label! You take another look at the image, then compare it to your current appearance. The resemblance is uncanny. However, despite the shock you're feeling, you can't help but grin - this is a pretty awesome costume. It'll be perfect for the party, in fact. You leave the change room, and step into...
15233212221.title: Large king outfit

1523322.content:
"These sections suck," you say to yourself. "There's gotta be something that could interest me."

You search the rest of the store and don't find anything worth your while.

You then come across the old man who owns the shop. "Can I help you son?"

"Yes. Do you have any costumes that more...interesting?"

"Like what, exactly?" he asks.

You couldn't think of anything in particular, so you just say the first thing that comes to mind. "Comic book characters."

"Haven't heard that one before," he replies, "Follow me."

The man takes you to a corner in the back of the store that you hadn't checked. In the corner, there costumes of comic book characters that you used to read about as a little kid.

Growing up, your favorite comic book character was Venom. But you can't find any Venom costume or mask.

You then decide to find a Spider Man costume and think about painting it black, but you can't find a Spider Man suit either.

"Have you made a choice?" the old man asks you.

"Not exactly," you say, "Do you have anything that would resemble Venom in anyway?"

"Let me look," he says as searches the shelves. He then pulls down a box and opens it, "Would this work?"

You look at the contents on the box.

Inside, there is what appears some sort of jumpsuit made of probably spandex that would cover every part of your body, except for the head, two thigh-high high heeled boots, a simple mask that would cover the area around your eyes, and a wig of platinum blonde hair.

"Well?" the man says.

You think it over in your head. You'll were the suit and just paint a Venom-like spider symbol on it. You have an old Venom mask somewhere in your closet that you can were.

At the cash register, the old man checks out the costume and you pay for it.

Just as you're about to leave, the old man says something.

"Before you leave, I must tell you something," he starts, it gets your attention, "No one has ever bought from my comic costume section, and I try to make sure they don't."

"Why?" you ask the man.

"Because those costumes are enchanted. The moment you walk out that door with that box, there is no turning back. Nothing in your life will ever be the same. You will talk different, walk different, look different, even live differently. I would just think about it for a moment."

With that, you decide to...

1523322211121.content:
You see the German Shepherd package. German Shepherds are your favorite animal! You take it off the hanger and run to the dressing room with it. You strip down naked, and put it on. You look in the mirror, and smile. But then, you feel like you're in pain. You clutch your sides for confort, but the pain started to grow stronger. You started to notice some changes to your eye color on the mirror when a jolt of pain came from your back, forcing you into all fours. Sweat startx to drip from your brown hair as you felt the costume tighten around your petite frame. Suddenly, a tightening noise comes from the top half of the costume as it started to tigthen around the back.
You could feel all your muscles revoltously changing size, growing out of their normal proportions in a very fast pace. Again you heard the back of the costume tightening and an excrusiating pain on your back as you felt your body somehow shrinking.
Another loud TIGHTEN! sound, and the top half became ao tight you felt like it would burst off. You noticed that your skin became itchy as it became brown, black and furry, and your back still pulsating in pain of the growth of a new appendage.
You felt the bottom half of the costume tighten, unable to contain your growing legs and torso as they bulged with newly grown muscles.
Soon after, the throbbing feet of the costume starts to bother you too much, so you kicked them away in time to watch her stiill-socked feet bulge with new size, your entire bone structure crackling with the changes.
The unbeareble pain on Your back started to fade a little, only to be traded by another pain on the tips of your fingers and toes. In horror, You watched the hands of the costume tighten as your fingers grew out with newly formed claws in place of nails, and what remained of Your socks was shredded by growing claws on your toes. And soon, your furry butt feels painful as a long tail grows.
This all happened too fast and as fast as the pain came, it started to fade away, leaving you stunned with a plethora of new sensations to explore.
You fainted for some minutes and when you woke up, your sight was all blurry and you had to blink to adjust your eyes to the light. With little effort, you got to your feet and immediately drew your attention to the mirror. "Where am I? Wow...all that I remember is putting on a German Shepherd costume-OH MY GOD!"
You were overwhelmed by the sight at the mirror before you. In place of you usual self, You saw a very brown and black face with a muzzle, your teeth were now fangs and your usual grass green eyes were now a shade of brown.
You looked around your body, newly changed it was still strange to you. You were definitely a bit smaller and your slim teenage frame was now a very curvy and athletic build. To add, you even had a collar around your neck
As you took a step, you immediately felt that the soles of her feet were a little more sensitive. "Oh my, what should I do? If that pain from earlier made me become a German Shepherd Hybrid, what has it done to my friends?"
You, seeing you had teats and a vagina, were embarresed.You then found a towel and put it on to cover your new animal female parts. You were actually thinking about leaving the room and seeing what had gone outside. Still, you started to think about what manner of fate awaited you if you left the dressing room.
